translation.en: ♪ You're so well-spoken ♪
translation.zh: NETFLIX 出品

translation.en: ♪ You show them you're outside… ♪
translation.zh: （新奥尔良）

translation.en: I know what you're thinkin'. How did a guy like me land a girl like her?
translation.zh: 我知道你在想什么像我这样一个家伙怎么跟她好上了？

translation.en: -We get this all the time. -We've been friends forever.
translation.zh: -一直有人这么问我们-我们做了一辈子朋友了

translation.en: [Dunk] I've always had a crush on her.
translation.zh: 我一直都暗恋她

translation.en: But society has deemed it socially unacceptable -for a tall girl to date a short guy. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 但是社会上有种风气觉得小个男孩不配去约会高个女孩

translation.en: Tell me about it. I mean, I was constantly bullied for being tall.
translation.zh: 可不是嘛我以前也总是因为个子高被人欺负

translation.en: -How's the weather up there? -Especially by my tormentor, Kimmy.
translation.zh: -上面的天气怎么样吧？-欺负我最厉害的就是基米

translation.en: -Nice sweatpants, Sasquatch. -[all giggling]
translation.zh: 运动裤不错 大脚野人

translation.en: [Jodi] It felt like a curse.
translation.zh: 感觉就像是一道诅咒

translation.en: Then this Swedish exchange student named Stig showed up--
translation.zh: 后来出现了一个名叫斯蒂格的瑞典交换生…

translation.en: -[Dunk] And stayed with my family. -[Jodi] He was even taller than me.
translation.zh: -住在我家-他比我个子还高

translation.en: They dated for a bit, but he totally played her.
translation.zh: 他们约会了 但是他最终耍了她

translation.en: [Jodi] Yeah, he did, and he humiliated me in front of our entire class.
translation.zh: 是的 他在整个年级面前羞辱了我

translation.en: She's, uh, secretly in love with me.
translation.zh: 她暗恋我

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Don't worry, I stepped in. I stood up for her…
translation.zh: 别担心 然后我挺身而出…

translation.en: She is so much cooler than all you guys combined.
translation.zh: 她比你们所有这些家伙加起来还要酷得多

translation.en: Took a punch to the face. It was no big deal.
translation.zh: 我脸上挨了一拳 这不算什么

translation.en: -[chuckles] It was a big deal. -It was a big deal.
translation.zh: -真的很值得一说-真的很值得一说

translation.en: Yeah, I mean…
translation.zh: 对 我是说…

translation.en: He was the one who gave me the confidence to stand up for myself
translation.zh: 他是那个给我自信让我敢于为自己说话的人

translation.en: with the sweetest gift. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 还送了我最美好的礼物

translation.en: After that, I owned my height.
translation.zh: 那之后 我为自己的身高而骄傲

translation.en: And homecoming was a big step for me.
translation.zh: 返校节上 我做了一件大事

translation.en: Uh, hi. I-- I'm Jodi.
translation.zh: 嘿 我是乔蒂

translation.en: You may know me as "Amazon" or "Jodi the Green Giant."
translation.zh: 你听说的我可能是“亚马逊女战士”或者“绿巨人乔蒂”

translation.en: Being tall actually is what makes me me, and I-- I like me.
translation.zh: 长得高真的成就了现在的我 我喜欢自己

translation.en: [Jodi] My best friend Fareeda
translation.zh: 我最好的朋友法丽达

translation.en: and my sister Harper were there, cheering me on.
translation.zh: 我的姐姐哈珀都在现场为我加油打劲

translation.en: And that's when she realized…
translation.zh: 那一刻我意识到…

translation.en: That he was the one I was supposed to be with all along.
translation.zh: 一直以来他才是那个应该和我厮守的人

translation.en: Mm-hm, which makes sense,
translation.zh: 这样就能说得通为什么

translation.en: considering I carried around a milk crate for my entire life,
translation.zh: 这样就能说得通为什么 我一直都带着个牛奶箱等待机会可以吻她

translation.en: waiting for my chance to kiss her.
translation.zh: 我一直都带着个牛奶箱等待机会可以吻她

translation.en: [Jodi] Which finally happened about three months ago.
translation.zh: 那一刻终于在三个月前发生了

translation.en: [Dunk] And it's been bliss ever since.
translation.zh: 之后一切都很美好

translation.en: Would the lady care--
translation.zh: 这位女士你介意…

translation.en: [yells] My back!
translation.zh: 我的背啊！

translation.en: Unfortunately, the milk crate's no longer with us.
translation.zh: 牛奶箱是用不上了

translation.en: Which is why I am buying him a backpack for our three-month anniversary.
translation.zh: 因此我想在三个月纪念日时给他买个背包

translation.en: Are you sure you don't mind leaning down to kiss me?
translation.zh: 你确定你不介意俯身吻我吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I'm sure.
translation.zh: 对 我确定

translation.en: -Sorry, we were just babbling. -Yeah, what was the question again?
translation.zh: -对不起 瞧我们这一通胡说八道-对 你的问题是什么来着？

translation.en: What brings you in today?
translation.zh: 你们今天过来要干嘛？

translation.en: -Well, the backpack. -Yeah, this one.
translation.zh: -买个背包-对 这个

translation.en: You like this one, right?
translation.zh: 你喜欢这个吧？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Okay.
translation.zh: -对-好

translation.en: -Hey. -I got you a smoothie.
translation.zh: -嘿-我给你拿了杯奶昔

translation.en: -Oh, thank you. -Of course.
translation.zh: -谢谢-没问题

translation.en: -Jodi! -Mikey! -What's up? -[Mikey] What up, girl?
translation.zh: -乔蒂！怎么样 妹子？-迈奇！你怎么样？

translation.en: -Hey-- -[Jodi] Oh, here.
translation.zh: -嘿…-这里

translation.en: I got you. There you go.
translation.zh: -我来帮你 这样就行-谢谢

translation.en: Suzie!
translation.zh: 苏西！

translation.en: I need to know where you got that top now.
translation.zh: 我现在就要知道你的上衣是在哪里买的

translation.en: Fareeda Marks. Remember the name.
translation.zh: 法丽达·马克斯 记住这个牌子

translation.en: -Thought she was talking about mine. -It's cute.
translation.zh: -我还以为在问我呢-很可爱

translation.en: Can I buy you a cup of coffee some time?
translation.zh: 什么时候能请你喝杯咖啡吗？

translation.en: Hey. Boyfriend. Right here.
translation.zh: 嘿 她的男朋友就在这里

translation.en: Didn't know. Just moved here.
translation.zh: 我不知道 初来乍到

translation.en: Keep moving.
translation.zh: 那就走吧

translation.en: But I've never given a speech in class before.
translation.zh: 我从没在班上做过演讲

translation.en: Just go out there and do your best, and if you mess up, just know it's okay.
translation.zh: 只管走上去 尽力而为搞砸了也没关系的

translation.en: Jodi! It's up!
translation.zh: 乔蒂！有了！

translation.en: Big moment.
translation.zh: 重要时刻

translation.en: Guys.
translation.zh: 各位

translation.en: I know you said not to make a big deal out of this…
translation.zh: 我知道你说过不必当真…

translation.en: -[both] But we didn't listen! -It's just an audition.
translation.zh: 但我们没听进去！ 这只不过是次试演

translation.en: That you've been wanting to do since middle school.
translation.zh: 你从中学以来就一直在等待了

translation.en: This is a moment to commemorate.
translation.zh: 这可是值得纪念的时刻

translation.en: [Stig] Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: This is not.
translation.zh: 这可不是

translation.en: -[Jodi] Hey. -Wow. What are we celebrating?
translation.zh: -嘿-哇 你们在庆祝什么？

translation.en: We aren't celebrating anything, because we are no longer friends.
translation.zh: 我们没庆祝什么因为你已经不是我们的朋友

translation.en: -Keep walking, IKEA. -Oh!
translation.zh: 走开吧 宜家男

translation.en: We're, uh-- We're celebrating my name on that audition list.
translation.zh: 我们在庆祝我去登记了试演名单

translation.en: Bye Bye Birdie? Wow.
translation.zh: 《欢乐今宵》？哇哦

translation.en: That's my second favorite musical! After Guys and Dolls.
translation.zh: 那是我第二喜欢的音乐剧！仅次于《红男绿女》

translation.en: Dunk, wanna know my third favorite?
translation.zh: 想知道我第三喜欢的是什么吗？

translation.en: [laughs] Oh my God! I don't care.
translation.zh: 天啊 我不在乎

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: [Stig] Okay.
translation.zh: 行吧

translation.en: See you guys later.
translation.zh: 回头见

translation.en: Knuckle touch?
translation.zh: 碰一个？

translation.en: Handshake?
translation.zh: 握一下？

translation.en: [Dunk] See you at home.
translation.zh: 回家见

translation.en: I can't believe he's trying to be friends with us
translation.zh: 真不敢相信他在羞辱了你之后还想和我们做朋友

translation.en: after torturing you with his sick, twisted mind games.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信他在羞辱了你之后还想和我们做朋友 还拿出那套恶心扭曲的套路

translation.en: I cannot believe that you forgave him after everything.
translation.zh: 我不敢相信发生了这一切后你还原谅了他

translation.en: He's apologized to us multiple times. Can you just give him a break?
translation.zh: 他已经向我们道歉很多次了你们能放过他吗？

translation.en: -No. -No. He's the worst.
translation.zh: -不-不行 他太差劲了

translation.en: -To Jodi. -[chuckles] To Jodi.
translation.zh: -敬乔蒂-敬乔蒂

translation.en: -To me. -[Fareeda chuckles]
translation.zh: 敬我

translation.en: -Mmm. Apple cider, a classic. [gargling]
translation.zh: 苹果酒 经典之选

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Hello. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: I'm Tommy.
translation.zh: 我是汤米

translation.en: I know. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: I saw you in Hairspray last year.
translation.zh: 我去年在《发胶星梦》里看过你

translation.en: -You were amazing. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 你很棒

translation.en: -Thank you. [laughs] -It was really good.
translation.zh: -谢谢-真的很好

translation.en: I'm Jodi, by the way.
translation.zh: 对了 我是乔蒂

translation.en: [Tommy] I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: I'm a fan of your work too.
translation.zh: 我也喜欢你的作品

translation.en: -My work? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 我的作品？ 对

translation.en: "So go ahead and… and keep calling me names."
translation.zh: “那就继续用那些名字称呼我吧”

translation.en: "Keep making fun of me. Keep asking me,
translation.zh: “继续取笑我 继续问我

translation.en: 'How's the weather up there?' Because the weather up here is great."
translation.zh: ‘上面的天气怎么样？’因为这里的天气真的不错”

translation.en: -Mm-hm. Yeah. -It's from your homecoming speech.
translation.zh: -对-你在返校节上的演讲

translation.en: You remember it.
translation.zh: 你记得

translation.en: I do. Yeah, every word.
translation.zh: 是的 每个字都记得

translation.en: How? [laughs]
translation.zh: 怎么会呢？

translation.en: Let's just say you are extremely memorable.
translation.zh: 应该说是你太令人难忘了

translation.en: -[boy] Hey, man. Watch it. -[Stig] Oh, sorry. Sorry.
translation.zh: -嘿 朋友 看路-对不起

translation.en: -Phew. -Jeez.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: -[sighs] -You okay?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Just a little on edge.
translation.zh: 对 有点紧张

translation.en: I've heard you sing. You have nothing to be nervous about.
translation.zh: 我听过你唱歌 你不必担心

translation.en: You'll do great.
translation.zh: 你会很棒

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 你在这里做什么？

translation.en: Auditioning. Same as you.
translation.zh: 试演 和你一样

translation.en: Madeline has already cast me in lead roles multiple times,
translation.zh: 玛德琳已经让我演过好几次主角了

translation.en: so this is really more of a formality than an audition.
translation.zh: 所以这次试演只是走个形式

translation.en: -Jodi Kreyman. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 乔蒂·克里曼

translation.en: -[Madeline] You're up. -Okay.
translation.zh: 到你了

translation.en: -You're gonna do great. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -你会表现不错的-谢谢

translation.en: [Kimmy] Try to relax…
translation.zh: 试着放松点…

translation.en: 'cause you don't stand a chance.
translation.zh: 因为你没有胜算

translation.en: Miss me, Stiggy baby?
translation.zh: 想我吗 斯蒂格宝贝？

translation.en: [sighs] Kimmy.
translation.zh: 基米

translation.en: ♪ One boy ♪
translation.zh: 那个男孩

translation.en: ♪ That's the way ♪
translation.zh: 就是这般

translation.en: ♪ It should ♪
translation.zh: 应是

translation.en: ♪ Be ♪
translation.zh: 如此

translation.en: So you've never performed on stage before?
translation.zh: 你从来没在舞台上表演过吗？

translation.en: Never.
translation.zh: 从没有过

translation.en: What about that speech you gave at the homecoming dance?
translation.zh: 那你在返校节上的那次演讲呢？

translation.en: Oh, uh… Well, I wouldn't call that a performance. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我觉得那算不上表演

translation.en: But you were on stage, in front of a huge crowd,
translation.zh: 但你当时登上了舞台还面对着一大群人

translation.en: delivering what was essentially an improvised monologue. Isn't that performing?
translation.zh: 呈现了一场即兴的独角戏那不是表演吗？

translation.en: I guess it is. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我猜算是吧

translation.en: What would you say to people who don't think that being tall is a real problem?
translation.zh: 你想对那些认为 身高不是现实问题的人说什么？

translation.en: Excuse me?
translation.zh: 不好意思？

translation.en: Getting a terminal illness, being homeless,
translation.zh: 患有绝症 无家可归

translation.en: not knowing where your next meal is coming from…
translation.zh: 不知道下一顿在哪儿的人…

translation.en: Those are real problems.
translation.zh: 那些才是现实问题

translation.en: But you seem to have so much going for you.
translation.zh: 但是你似乎觉得自己的问题特别大

translation.en: What do you have to complain about?
translation.zh: 你有什么好抱怨的呢？

translation.en: Well, I'm not saying being tall is worse than those things.
translation.zh: 我没有说长得高比这些事情更糟糕

translation.en: It's just sometimes it feels like it is, but I know that it's not.
translation.zh: 有时候感觉是如此但我知道并不是如此

translation.en: It just… doesn't make all the bad things
translation.zh: 但这样并不会让我生活中的所有糟糕事情

translation.en: that have happened to me every day of my entire life any less real.
translation.zh: 但这样并不会让我生活中的所有糟糕事情 变得不真实

translation.en: Performing has always been my dream,
translation.zh: 表演一直是我的梦想

translation.en: but I didn't think I could do it, until now.
translation.zh: 但是我以前不知道自己能不能行直到现在

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Thank you for coming in.
translation.zh: 谢谢你过来

translation.en: -[soft piano music] -[man] Wait a second, Harper.
translation.zh: 等一下 哈珀

translation.en: -You were offered a job? -[Harper] Mm-hm.
translation.zh: -你找到工作了？-嗯

translation.en: Like a real job?
translation.zh: 真的工作吗？

translation.en: Like with money?
translation.zh: 有钱的那种？

translation.en: -Yes. With benefits and a parking space… -Whoo!
translation.zh: 对 有福利 有停车位
还有401000美元

translation.en: No, I think you mean a 401(k).
translation.zh: 不 我觉得你说的是401(k)退休金计划

translation.en: -Mmm… Agree to disagree. -That's usually--
translation.zh: -我持保留意见-那通常是…

translation.en: Wait. What is this job?
translation.zh: 等等 这是什么工作？

translation.en: Say hello to the co-host
translation.zh: 敬请期待 我即将合作主持的

translation.en: of the newest behind-the-scenes entertainment show
translation.zh: 最新幕后娱乐节目

translation.en: on the Pageant Network.
translation.zh: 尽在选美网络

translation.en: There's a Pageant Network? What channel?
translation.zh: 有选美网络吗？哪个频道？

translation.en: How dare you? Come on.
translation.zh: 你怎么能这样！拜托

translation.en: Congrats.
translation.zh: 恭喜

translation.en: Thank you. Oh, by the way, the job is in LA.
translation.zh: 谢谢 对了 这份工作在洛城

translation.en: Louisiana?
translation.zh: 路易斯安那？

translation.en: -You're moving to California? -Los Angeles?
translation.zh: -你要搬到加州去？-洛杉矶？

translation.en: Sorry, just wanted to rip the Band-Aid off.
translation.zh: 对不起 我只想快刀斩乱麻

translation.en: Every time she speaks, it's like I'm getting punched in the face.
translation.zh: 每次她这么说我都觉得脸上被揍了一下

translation.en: -Let's have another baby. -I'm very fertile.
translation.zh: 我们再生一个吧 我还很能生

translation.en: Okay, this is my chance to prove to myself
translation.zh: 好吧 这次机会能够向我自己和所有人证明

translation.en: and everyone else that I have more to offer this world than just--
translation.zh: 我在这个世界上不只是…

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: That I'm more than just shiny hair -and perfectly exfoliated skin. -[phone alert]
translation.zh: 不只是拥有闪亮的秀发和完美无暇的肌肤

translation.en: -I'm someone to be taken seriously. -Yes, you are.
translation.zh: 我也是个能认真做事的人 对 你是

translation.en: -[Harper] Which is why-- -[screams] Oh my God, I got the lead! Oh!
translation.zh: 所以我才要… 我的天 我选上主角了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: -Sorry. I did not mean to cut you off. -Uh, no, no, I was done. What lead?
translation.zh: 对不起 我不是故意打断你 没有 我说完了 什么主角？

translation.en: The spring musical.
translation.zh: 春季音乐剧

translation.en: The director just texted me, and I'm playing Kim in Bye Bye Birdie.
translation.zh: 导演刚刚给我发信息 我要演《欢乐今宵》的基姆

translation.en: -What? -What?
translation.zh: -什么？-什么？

translation.en: Look at my girls! Both headed for greatness.
translation.zh: 看看我的女儿们啊 全都有大好未来

translation.en: I gotta-- I gotta text Dunk.
translation.zh: 我要给邓柯儿发消息

translation.en: -Oh yeah. -[laughing]
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Dad, you-- you text my boyfriend?
translation.zh: 爸爸 你在跟我男朋友发信息？

translation.en: -[mom] Oh yeah. -Well, seven, eight times a day, max.
translation.zh: 一天最多也就七八次

translation.en: -That's weird. -Strange.
translation.zh: -很古怪-奇怪

translation.en: Oh! We're gonna throw you a huge party for opening night.
translation.zh: 开演的那晚我们要给你办一场大派对

translation.en: No, please. No party.
translation.zh: 不 别了 别办派对

translation.en: -Yes. You are getting a party! -Yes.
translation.zh: 要的 要给你办派对

translation.en: -[parents] Party! Party! Party! -No. No…
translation.zh: 派对！

translation.en: -[Jodi] No. -[mom] How do you feel about floats?
translation.zh: 哇哦 你觉得搞点漂浮物怎么样？

translation.en: -[Jodi] No. -[mom] Theme - birds.
translation.zh: -不要-主题是小鸟

translation.en: -You said 12, right? -Thank you.
translation.zh: -你说12块 对吗？-谢谢

translation.en: -And, uh… -[seller] Thanks.
translation.zh: 还有…

translation.en: And whatever this fine couple wants. It's on me.
translation.zh: 不管这对美好的情侣想要什么都算我的

translation.en: Toppings are included.
translation.zh: 包括配料

translation.en: -[woman] That's so sweet. -No problem. We're having a big night.
translation.zh: -你太好了-没关系 我们正在度过美好的夜晚我们在庆祝

translation.en: -We're celebrating, so… [chuckles] -Yeah.
translation.zh: 我们正在度过美好的夜晚我们在庆祝

translation.en: -So, treating yourself to two scoops? -You know my motto.
translation.zh: 所以你自己要两勺冰淇淋？ 你知道我的格言 越高总是越好

translation.en: -Taller is always better. -Ah.
translation.zh: 你知道我的格言 越高总是越好

translation.en: Speaking of taller, what's she, like, six-two, six-three?
translation.zh: 说到越高 她多高来着一米八八 还是一米九二？

translation.en: -Rude. -No.
translation.zh: -没礼貌-不会

translation.en: No, no, no, rude. You know what? Excuse me.
translation.zh: 不 没礼貌 -对不起 先生 不含配料了-不 没事 谢谢你

translation.en: -Hold on. No more toppings for you. -No, no, no, it's cool. Thank you.
translation.zh: -对不起 先生 不含配料了-不 没事 谢谢你

translation.en: Enjoy your toppings, guys. Okay.
translation.zh: 享受你们的配料 两位

translation.en: [Jodi] It's okay.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -真的？-对

translation.en: Three months ago, that really would have bothered you.
translation.zh: 三个月前 这还让你很困扰

translation.en: Probably.
translation.zh: 也许吧

translation.en: And, uh, also three months ago,
translation.zh: 而且三个月前

translation.en: you could barely speak in front of a crowd.
translation.zh: 你还不怎么能在人前说话

translation.en: But now you're going to be performing in front of the whole school.
translation.zh: 现在你即将在全校面前表演了

translation.en: [sighs] Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: I mean, as the star of the show.
translation.zh: 作为表演之星

translation.en: A night that will change your whole life.
translation.zh: 一个晚上将会改变你的一生

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah…
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: But thank you for believing I could do it, even when I didn't.
translation.zh: 但是谢谢你相信我可以 哪怕我不行

translation.en: You're gonna crush it.
translation.zh: 你一定会做得特别好

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Cheers.
translation.zh: 加油

translation.en: Cheers.
translation.zh: 加油

translation.en: [voice] You don't deserve this part.
translation.zh: 你配不上这个角色

translation.en: You got lucky.
translation.zh: 你只是走运

translation.en: -[crickets chirping] -[voice] You finally got your dream.
translation.zh: 你终于实现了自己的梦想

translation.en: You think you can actually pull this off?
translation.zh: 你真的觉得自己能够成功？

translation.en: So this voice just pops into your head last night while brushing your teeth,
translation.zh: 所以 昨晚刷牙的时候这个声音一直在你脑海里出现

translation.en: and now it won't go away?
translation.zh: 现在都消失不了？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Have you heard it before?
translation.zh: 之前有听到过吗？

translation.en: Well, I mean, there's always been a voice, but nothing like this.
translation.zh: 一直有种声音 但是不像这样

translation.en: I mean, this one, it's just--
translation.zh: 我是说 这次真的是…

translation.en: Louder? Crueler? Makes you believe your worst fears and insecurities are true?
translation.zh: 更大声？更残忍？ 让你觉得你最坏的担心都会成真？

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 对！

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: I was… afraid this might happen.
translation.zh: 我很害怕可能会发生

translation.en: I prayed it wouldn't, but if only I'd prayed harder.
translation.zh: 我曾祈祷不会但是我要是祈祷得再虔诚些就好了

translation.en: What are you talking about?
translation.zh: 你在说什么？

translation.en: That voice!
translation.zh: 那个声音！

translation.en: That negative voice in your head,
translation.zh: 你脑海中的消极声音

translation.en: the one that tells you that you're a fraud,
translation.zh: 告诉你说你是个骗子

translation.en: and all the wonderful things happening in your life
translation.zh: 你人生中所有的美好事情

translation.en: aren't because you're talented or smart.
translation.zh: 你人生中所有的美好事情 都不是因为你有天赋或者聪明

translation.en: It's just because you're lucky.
translation.zh: 只是因为你走运

translation.en: But why would it happen now?
translation.zh: 但为什么现在会这样？

translation.en: [laughs] Because now you're out there,
translation.zh: 因为现在是你

translation.en: risking failure and humiliation,
translation.zh: 去冒险承担失败和被羞辱

translation.en: and the more out there you are,
translation.zh: 你越向前走

translation.en: the louder that voice gets.
translation.zh: 这个声音就会越大

translation.en: So how do I make it stop?
translation.zh: 那我要怎么让它停下？

translation.en: You can't.
translation.zh: 你做不到

translation.en: It's just a horrible part of life that never goes away.
translation.zh: 那就是生活的一部分永远不会消失

translation.en: Like Maroon 5.
translation.zh: 就像魔力红乐队

translation.en: -[sniffs] Ugh, allergies. -Wait, so you get it too?
translation.zh: -过敏了-等等 所以你也有过？

translation.en: [laughs] No! No! No. No, no, no, no, no.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: But I've been in 37 beauty pageants.
translation.zh: 但是我参加过37次选美比赛

translation.en: And every single time, I'd see that voice tear someone apart so badly,
translation.zh: 每次我都能看到有些人被那种声音伤得特别严重

translation.en: they couldn't even step foot on stage.
translation.zh: 她们甚至都没法上台

translation.en: So you're saying that that… that could be me?
translation.zh: 你是说我有可能这样？

translation.en: I'm saying there's no worse bully than the one you create in your own head.
translation.zh: 我是在说没有什么比你脑海里的想法更能伤害你

translation.en: You have to control it. Otherwise, it could eventually get worse
translation.zh: 你得控制它否则会变得更糟糕

translation.en: and control you.
translation.zh: 然后控制你

translation.en: Okay. [sighs]
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: You cast Jodi as the lead and me as her understudy?
translation.zh: 你选了乔蒂做主演让我做她的替补？

translation.en: Theater is about taking risks.
translation.zh: 戏剧就是冒险

translation.en: I cast Jodi as the lead because she possesses
translation.zh: 我选乔蒂当主演 因为她有一种

translation.en: a rawness and authenticity that the role desperately needs.
translation.zh: 那个角色需要的原始和真实

translation.en: So I'm just supposed to sit back in rehearsals and watch?
translation.zh: 所以我在彩排的时候就坐着看吗？

translation.en: There are no small parts, Kimmy, just small actors.
translation.zh: 没有小角色 基米 只有小演员

translation.en: Well, that's nice to know.
translation.zh: 好吧 你说得倒挺好

translation.en: [yells] 'Cause one thing Jodi definitely is not is a small actor!
translation.zh: 因为乔蒂可不是什么小演员！

translation.en: I'm sorry, Kimmy.
translation.zh: 对不起 基米

translation.en: [scoffs] Oh, this isn't over. I'm just getting started.
translation.zh: 不 这还没完 我要开始搞事了

translation.en: Oh, I'm afraid to ask.
translation.zh: 我真不敢问

translation.en: All we have to do is humiliate Jodi so badly
translation.zh: 我们要做的是在排练第一天

translation.en: on the first day of rehearsal that she drops out.
translation.zh: 好好羞辱乔蒂一番 让她退出

translation.en: For instance, I'm just pitching, you slip NyQuil
translation.zh: 比如说 我只是提供个想法你可以把安眠药倒进

translation.en: into one of the smoothies Dunkleman makes her so she passes out.
translation.zh: 比如说 我只是提供个想法你可以把安眠药倒进 邓柯曼给她准备的奶昔里这样她就昏过去了

translation.en: -Or did you see that movie Carrie? -Mm-hm.
translation.zh: 还有你看过《魔女嘉莉》吗？

translation.en: She gets a bucket of pig guts dropped on her from the rafters.
translation.zh: 她被浇了满满一身猪血

translation.en: "Bye Bye Jodi."
translation.zh: 《欢乐乔蒂》

translation.en: I don't know where I would get pig guts.
translation.zh: 我不知道去哪里弄猪血

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Then Google it.
translation.zh: 那就上网查啊 怎么了？

translation.en: -What? -Doing your dirty work…
translation.zh: 那就上网查啊 怎么了？ 做这些脏事让我觉得有些…脏

translation.en: It's just starting to make me feel a little, well… well, dirty.
translation.zh: 做这些脏事让我觉得有些…脏

translation.en: -Where is this coming from? -Ever since we lost Liz, I just…
translation.zh: 为什么会这么觉得？ 自从我们失去莉兹

translation.en: I-- I can't stop thinking about how fragile life is.
translation.zh: 我就忍不住想生命是多么脆弱

translation.en: She didn't die! Her mom got a new job, and they moved to Seattle.
translation.zh: 她没有死 她妈妈找到了新工作她们搬去了西雅图！

translation.en: Okay, but still, it's like one day, your best friend is right here,
translation.zh: 好吧 但还是一样某天 你最好的朋友在这里

translation.en: and then the next, they're gone.
translation.zh: 然后过了一天 她们不见了

translation.en: I don't know what to tell you, Schnip. This is who I am.
translation.zh: 我不知道要怎么跟你说这就是我

translation.en: And if you can't have my back when I need you the most, then…
translation.zh: 如果你不能在我最需要的时候支持我 那么

translation.en: maybe this friendship has run its course.
translation.zh: 也许这段友情就走到尽头了

translation.en: Maybe it has.
translation.zh: 也许是吧

translation.en: Wait, what?
translation.zh: 等等 什么？

translation.en: Maybe I need to find out who I am on my own,
translation.zh: 也许我得自己去发现我是谁

translation.en: instead of as your sidekick. That's all I've ever been.
translation.zh: 而不是作为你的伙伴一直以来都是如此

translation.en: Be well. Try and remember the good times.
translation.zh: 好好的 试着回忆一下好时光

translation.en: You try and remember the good times! [scoffs]
translation.zh: 你才要试着回忆一下好时光呢！

translation.en: -[Dunk] What do you think of this color? -[Jodi] So beautiful. I'm snapping it all.
translation.zh: -你觉得这是什么颜色？-好漂亮 我要它们都拍下来

translation.en: -[Dunk] I don't know if I'm feeling 'em. -[Jodi] No?
translation.zh: -我不知道它们怎么样-不吗？我觉得你戴着很好看

translation.en: -I really think they look great on you. -Hey, Fareeda.
translation.zh: -我不知道它们怎么样-不吗？我觉得你戴着很好看 嘿 法丽达

translation.en: Is this me?
translation.zh: 这还是我吗？

translation.en: I don't know, Stig. Who are you?
translation.zh: 我不知道 斯蒂格 你是谁？

translation.en: I-- I'm sorry, I just can't believe that you invited Stig out today with us.
translation.zh: 对不起 我就是不敢相信你今天邀请了斯蒂格和我们一起

translation.en: He didn't get a part in the show.
translation.zh: 他没能得到任何角色

translation.en: He's been really down, and, I don't know, he has no one to hang out with, so…
translation.zh: 他真的很难过 没人和他玩 所以…

translation.en: Sounds like a him problem, not a me problem.
translation.zh: 听起来那是他的问题 不是我的问题

translation.en: Okay, if I am able to give him a second chance,
translation.zh: 如果我都能给他第二次机会

translation.en: you should be able to give him a first one.
translation.zh: 也许你应该先给他一次机会

translation.en: Let's be honest, you never really did.
translation.zh: 说实话 你都没给过他机会

translation.en: -[Dunk] Right after I make this call. -That shirt is sick.
translation.zh: -等我打完这个电话-这件衣服好酷

translation.en: Oh, thank you. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: Where'd you get it?
translation.zh: 你从哪里买的？

translation.en: Actually, my best friend Fareeda designed it.
translation.zh: 其实这是我最好的朋友法丽达设计的

translation.en: -Hi. -Yeah, and she's amazing. [chuckles]
translation.zh: -嗨-对 她超棒

translation.en: She knows the three Fs like nobody's business.
translation.zh: 她比谁都了解三大要素

translation.en: You know the three Fs?
translation.zh: 你知道哪三大要素？

translation.en: Form, fit, function. Come on.
translation.zh: 版型 适配 功能

translation.en: I replaced having a social life with watching Queer Eye. Okay?
translation.zh: 我的社交生活已经变成看《粉雄救兵》了 好吗？

translation.en: Can you bring me a few of these?
translation.zh: 你能再拿一些衣服来吗？

translation.en: You mean, to sell?
translation.zh: 你是说售卖？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Oh, I have so many more.
translation.zh: -对-哦 我还有很多

translation.en: -Tons more. -Even way cooler ones.
translation.zh: -多的不得了-还有更酷的版本

translation.en: Like way, way cooler.
translation.zh: 酷的不得了

translation.en: Then I guess you'll have to bring those too.
translation.zh: 那你可都一并送过来了

translation.en: I will.
translation.zh: 我会的

translation.en: That was amazing. I'm so proud of you.
translation.zh: 太好了 我好为你自豪

translation.en: I'm so proud of us. Look at us, girl bosses bossin' it up.
translation.zh: 我太为我们自豪了看看我们 巾帼不让须眉

translation.en: -It's amazing. -We're livin' the dream.
translation.zh: -太好了-我们梦想成真了

translation.en: -Boom. -Whoo! High five!
translation.zh: -嘣！-哇！来击个掌！

translation.en: Medium five? Or low?
translation.zh: 放低一些？再低一些？

translation.en: This is only because you said that nice thing about me.
translation.zh: 这只是因为你为我说了好话

translation.en: [Dunk] So I got you some things for your first day.
translation.zh: 所以我为你的第一天准备了些东西

translation.en: Here you go. It's three water bottles.
translation.zh: 这里是三瓶水

translation.en: -You can put those anywhere. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -你可以随便放-谢谢

translation.en: Some throat coat tea, and a kettle to warm up the water for the throat coat tea,
translation.zh: 一些润喉茶 还有热茶用的茶壶

translation.en: 'cause otherwise, you're just drinkin' water.
translation.zh: 否则你就只会喝水

translation.en: Some, uh… Some lozenges, which, if you could take those right there.
translation.zh: 还有一些润喉糖 你可以都拿着

translation.en: -Cool. -Oh, but that's not all.
translation.zh: 但是还不止

translation.en: And a snack. I know you like to snack. Last but not least,
translation.zh: 还有零食 我知道你喜欢零食最后也是最重要的

translation.en: I got you a pitch pipe for singing.
translation.zh: 我为你准备了唱歌的定调管

translation.en: I got myself one too, because they're awesome.
translation.zh: 我给自己也准备了一个因为它们太棒了

translation.en: -[giggles] Right. -[blows note]
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: That's beautiful! [laughs]
translation.zh: 你真好

translation.en: -Thank you. This is perfect. -Yeah?
translation.zh: 谢谢你 太完美了

translation.en: I just want you to have a good first rehearsal, and I'll just…
translation.zh: 我希望你的第一次排练顺利

translation.en: I'll be… hangin' out until you're done.
translation.zh: 我希望你的第一次排练顺利 我会到处走走 直到你结束

translation.en: You must have something better to do than sit around and wait for me.
translation.zh: 你别光坐着等我去找点其他的事情做吧

translation.en: [laughing] Yeah! I do.
translation.zh: 当然了

translation.en: I have to feed my fish.
translation.zh: 我要去喂鱼

translation.en: You don't have a fish.
translation.zh: 你没有养鱼

translation.en: -I have to buy a fish. And then feed it. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 我得去买条鱼 然后喂它

translation.en: -Okay. -For sure.
translation.zh: -好吧-当然了

translation.en: Whew. Here I go.
translation.zh: 那我走了

translation.en: Good luck.
translation.zh: 祝你好运

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -[girl 1] Hi! -[girl 2] Hi!
translation.zh: -嗨-嗨

translation.en: -Okay. -[voice] You're way out of your league.
translation.zh: -好吧-你太自不量力了

translation.en: And they all know it.
translation.zh: 大家都心里有数

translation.en: Kimmy should be the lead.
translation.zh: 基米应该是主角

translation.en: -[girl] Kimmy! -[echoing] And you know it… know it…
translation.zh: -基米-你也清楚

translation.en: [Jodi] Oh, shoot. Sorry. Sorry.
translation.zh: 哎呀 抱歉

translation.en: Hello, Kim. We meet again.
translation.zh: 你好 基姆 我们又见面了

translation.en: It's-- It's Jodi, actually.
translation.zh: 我其实是乔蒂

translation.en: But you're playing Kim, and I'm playing Conrad.
translation.zh: 但是你要演基姆 我会演康拉德

translation.en: -Yeah. Right. -Let me help you with all this, please.
translation.zh: -对 是的-我来帮你接下这些

translation.en: -Thank you. -Jeez.
translation.zh: -谢谢-天啊

translation.en: -Got a lot. -Oh, yeah. Yeah, you do.
translation.zh: -真够多的-对 真是挺多

translation.en: -Okay… -Aah…
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: Seen the rehearsal schedule?
translation.zh: -你看彩排安排了吗？-不 还没有

translation.en: -No, not yet. -Oh, it's nuts.
translation.zh: -你看彩排安排了吗？-不 还没有 太疯狂了 接下来这个月我们基本每时每刻都会呆在一起

translation.en: We're basically spending every second together for the next month, so…
translation.zh: 太疯狂了 接下来这个月我们基本每时每刻都会呆在一起

translation.en: Yeah. You're gonna get sick of seeing my face, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 你会看我的脸看到想吐的 对不起

translation.en: No, you're gonna get sick of seeing my face.
translation.zh: 不 你会看我的脸看到想吐

translation.en: That's impossible.
translation.zh: 不可能的

translation.en: No, seriously, you're just gonna look at me one day and be like… [babbles]
translation.zh: 说真的 有一天你会看着我然后就…

translation.en: I'm really nervous. Sorry, I don't know if you can tell. I just--
translation.zh: 我真有点紧张 对不起我不知道你能不能看出来 但我真是…

translation.en: -It's fine. [laughs] -Right. Okay.
translation.zh: -没事-好的 没事

translation.en: It's just tall people aren't really known for their coordination.
translation.zh: 高个子的协调性真的不好说

translation.en: You got this.
translation.zh: 你可以的

translation.en: [woman] Goodbye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: -Oof! -Oh my God.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: Jodi, you have the first line.
translation.zh: 乔蒂 第一句台词是你的

translation.en: Oh, I must have missed that. Sorry.
translation.zh: 我应该漏掉了 对不起

translation.en: -Yeah, along with the rest of your lines. -♪ Oh yeah ♪
translation.zh: 没错 还有剩下的台词

translation.en: [Madeline] Let's try that again.
translation.zh: 我们再试一次 这就开始

translation.en: -Sorry. Shoot! Sorry, sorry, sorry. -Oh!
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: -[piano keys jangle] -You're making it worse!
translation.zh: 你让情况变得更糟了！

translation.en: -Christian! -It's fine. See?
translation.zh: 没关系的 看

translation.en: [murmurs] Sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: First week of rehearsals is the hardest.
translation.zh: 第一周的彩排总是最难

translation.en: Especially with you trying to psych me out from the sidelines.
translation.zh: 特别是你在我旁边一惊一乍

translation.en: -There's no shame in quitting. -Why would I quit?
translation.zh: -退出不是什么丢人的事-我为什么要退出？

translation.en: Because when the time comes
translation.zh: 因为等到你站上舞台

translation.en: for you to be standing on stage in front of a packed audience,
translation.zh: 面对着一大群观众的时候

translation.en: blinded by the lights, sweat pouring down your face,
translation.zh: 你会被灯光照得看不见脸上汗如雨下

translation.en: you know deep down you'll choke.
translation.zh: 你心里很清楚自己会搞砸

translation.en: Hey, she won't choke. She's gonna be amazing.
translation.zh: 嘿 她不会搞砸 她会表现得很好

translation.en: Whatever. You two deserve each other.
translation.zh: 随便吧 你们两个开心就好

translation.en: Hey, look, I don't know why you just stuck up for me but… thank you.
translation.zh: 嘿 听着 我不知道你们为什么因为我而闹得不愉快 但还是…谢谢

translation.en: Yeah, my pleasure.
translation.zh: 没事 我很高兴

translation.en: Yeah, so, um,
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: do you ever think about that time we kissed?
translation.zh: 你会想起我们上次的接吻吗？

translation.en: [laughs] No.
translation.zh: 不会

translation.en: Right. Me too.
translation.zh: 好吧 我会

translation.en: Every day. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 每一天

translation.en: I'm just…
translation.zh: 我只是…

translation.en: -Oh no. Oh! -[clattering]
translation.zh: 不会吧

translation.en: Aah! Asparagus! Okay, come on. Come on. Oh boy.
translation.zh: 芦笋 好吧 拜托了 天啊

translation.en: Please.
translation.zh: 拜托了

translation.en: Oh no!
translation.zh: 不会吧！

translation.en: Oh, come on. Come on, come on!
translation.zh: 拜托！

translation.en: Ah, no! You burned the chicken stuffed in the duck stuffed in the turkey?
translation.zh: 不会吧！你把火鸡里的鸭子里的鸡烤焦了？

translation.en: It's a turducken, Dad. Yeah, I ruined it.
translation.zh: -这是火鸡鸭 爸爸 是的 我搞糟了-我说过让你烤鸡就好

translation.en: I told you to go with roasted chicken. You flew too close to the sun.
translation.zh: -这是火鸡鸭 爸爸 是的 我搞糟了-我说过让你烤鸡就好 -你飞得离太阳太近了-我不想只是求稳

translation.en: -I didn't want to play safe. I don't know. -What is burning in here?
translation.zh: -你飞得离太阳太近了-我不想只是求稳 这里什么烧着了？

translation.en: The dinner I'm making for Jodi, who'll be here in an hour.
translation.zh: 我在给乔蒂准备晚饭她一小时后就过来

translation.en: -Ooh, what's the occasion? -Three-month anniversary.
translation.zh: -什么事？-三个月纪念日

translation.en: That's so massive at your age, and now the night is a tur-dumpster fire.
translation.zh: 这对你这个年纪来说是很重要但今晚的火鸡鸭算是歇菜了

translation.en: -How is that helpful? -Sorry. At all?
translation.zh: -这么说有用吗？有用吗？-对不起

translation.en: -Mm-hm. -I got you, Dunkers Seniors.
translation.zh: 我懂你 老邓柯儿

translation.en: [dad] You two boys work it out. Don't get me in trouble with Mom.
translation.zh: 你们男孩忙吧别给我和你妈妈找麻烦

translation.en: Hey. Hey, man. What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你要做什么？

translation.en: We've less than an hour to cook. Not much, Dunkers.
translation.zh: 我们备菜的时间只有一个小时不到了时间不多 邓柯儿

translation.en: -Give me a hand and chop these onions. -Oh.
translation.zh: 帮把手 把洋葱切了

translation.en: Onions? Are you trying to sabotage me?
translation.zh: 你是要给我搞麻烦吗？

translation.en: I need them in the pan ASAP if they're to caramelize. Chop-chop.
translation.zh: 我需要让它们在锅里焦糖化你快切吧

translation.en: I haven't talked to you in months. Now you'll help me?
translation.zh: 我们好几个月没说过话而你现在要帮忙？

translation.en: Do you want to impress your girlfriend, or sit here and chitchat? Hmm?
translation.zh: 你是要让她惊艳还是就这么叽叽喳喳？

translation.en: Yes, chef. Sorry, chef.
translation.zh: 好的 大厨 对不起 大厨

translation.en: For your first course, Dunkers here has prepared bruschetta
translation.zh: 你们的第一道菜邓柯儿为您准备了意式烤面包

translation.en: topped with roasted tomatoes, caramelized onions,
translation.zh: 上面是烤番茄 焦糖洋葱

translation.en: and if I may be so bold, it pairs very nicely with the iced teas.
translation.zh: 我冒昧说一句 它和冰茶非常搭配

translation.en: I hope you enjoy.
translation.zh: 希望你们好好享用

translation.en: -I'm going to go check on the pasta. Ciao. -[both laugh]
translation.zh: 我回去看看意大利面 -回见-这是怎么回事？

translation.en: [Jodi] What was that?
translation.zh: -回见-这是怎么回事？

translation.en: He offered to wait on us. I wasn't gonna turn him down.
translation.zh: 他说要为我们服务 我不想拒绝他

translation.en: [laughs] Just make sure you-- you leave him a nice tip.
translation.zh: 给他多点小费

translation.en: -I thought you were paying. -Am I now?
translation.zh: -我以为你会付-我吗？

translation.en: -Dad? Dad, what are you doing? -You're just killing it right now.
translation.zh: -爸爸？你在干嘛？-你们现在太好了

translation.en: Okay, bounce now.
translation.zh: 好吧 快闪人

translation.en: -There you go. Thank you, Dad. -[shutter clicks]
translation.zh: 你可以走了 谢谢你 爸爸

translation.en: -Okay. [laughs] -I don't know!
translation.zh: -好-我不知道

translation.en: Before we eat, I'd like to make a toast. Okay.
translation.zh: -开动之前 我想说两句-好

translation.en: I just want to say how happy I am
translation.zh: 我只是想说今晚能和你坐在这里

translation.en: to be sitting here with you tonight.
translation.zh: 我真的好开心

translation.en: And to watch you face your fears
translation.zh: 看到你面对自己的恐惧

translation.en: and chase this big dream
translation.zh: 追逐自己的梦想

translation.en: of performing in front of people
translation.zh: 在别人面前表演

translation.en: is truly inspiring.
translation.zh: 真的非常鼓舞人

translation.en: [voice] A dream that you know will never happen. -[echoing] …never happen… -[Stig] Dunkers…
translation.zh: 你知道这个梦想永远不会实现的

translation.en: Once you bomb, he'll say, "Bye Bye Jodi… Bye Bye Jodi…"
translation.zh: 只要你失败了他就会说：“欢乐乔蒂”

translation.en: So enjoy tonight,
translation.zh: 所以好好享受今晚

translation.en: because there won't be a four-month anniversary.
translation.zh: 因为不会有四个月的纪念日了

translation.en: -Anniversary… -Jodi? Jodi!
translation.zh: 乔蒂？

translation.en: Yeah! Yeah.
translation.zh: 在

translation.en: Are you okay? I'm sorry. It looked like you were spacing out.
translation.zh: 你还好吗？对不起看起来你像是走神了

translation.en: -I'm sorry. My-- -It's okay.
translation.zh: -对不起-没事的

translation.en: My mind is just… elsewhere.
translation.zh: 我的思绪飘走了

translation.en: I'm under so much pressure for the show, but I've been looking forward to this night.
translation.zh: 这个表演让我压力好大但是我很期待

translation.en: No, don't worry about it. I get it.
translation.zh: 不 别担心 我懂你

translation.en: Look, if you need this time to rehearse or memorize your lines…
translation.zh: 听着 如果你现在需要去排练或者记台词

translation.en: I don't know your process--
translation.zh: 我不知道你们的流程 但是…

translation.en: -No, no, I'm not-- -But whatever you need to do.
translation.zh: -不 我不是…-你做什么都可以

translation.en: I'm not leaving in the middle of our anniversary dinner, okay?
translation.zh: 我不会离开纪念日晚餐 好吗？

translation.en: Well, if you felt like you needed to, I would understand.
translation.zh: 如果你觉得自己需要 我会理解的

translation.en: How did I get so lucky?
translation.zh: 我怎么这么走运？

translation.en: Pretty amazing.
translation.zh: 真的超棒

translation.en: -Thank you. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -谢谢你-好

translation.en: -Right. -Okay.
translation.zh: -对了-好

translation.en: What? Huh?
translation.zh: 什么？嗯？

translation.en: What? Wait… Wh…
translation.zh: 什么？等等…

translation.en: Are you actually leaving?
translation.zh: 你是真的要走吗？

translation.en: Well, you just-- You just said you didn't mind.
translation.zh: 你刚说过你不介意

translation.en: Yeah. Okay.
translation.zh: 对 好吧

translation.en: -So you do mind? -A little.
translation.zh: -所以你确实介意？-有一点

translation.en: Then you just… You shouldn't have said it.
translation.zh: 那你就不该那么说

translation.en: I didn't think you would actually do it.
translation.zh: 我以为你不会那么做

translation.en: Pasta primavera!
translation.zh: 春蔬意大利面！

translation.en: Fine. I'll stay.
translation.zh: 好吧 我留下

translation.en: -Don't do me any favors. -What is that supposed to mean?
translation.zh: -别给我留什么面子-这是什么意思？

translation.en: Uh, parmigiano. No?
translation.zh: 帕尔马干酪？不要嘛？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不要

translation.en: -Okay. -[Dunk scoffs]
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Jodi, you're like Miss Popular now at school.
translation.zh: 乔蒂 你现在在学校受欢迎了

translation.en: Every time we walk down the hallway, it's always, "Jodi!" "Mikey!"
translation.zh: 每次我们在走廊里总是 “乔蒂！” “迈奇！”

translation.en: "Hey, can I buy you coffee sometime?" I mean,
translation.zh: “什么时候能请你喝杯咖啡吗？”

translation.en: why would the star of the spring musical have time for little old Dunks anymore?
translation.zh: 春季音乐剧之星怎么可能有时间搭理小邓柯儿呢？

translation.en: -[sighs] -Am I a burden to you? -That's what it feels like. -No.
translation.zh: -我是你的负担吗？我感觉是这样-不是

translation.en: I just didn't know that's how you feel.
translation.zh: 我只是不知道你会有这种感觉

translation.en: Do you know how many candles I lit for this? This was a big deal.
translation.zh: 你知道我为你点了多少蜡烛吗？真的很多

translation.en: I've actually lost my appetite, so…
translation.zh: 我已经没有胃口了 所以…

translation.en: I'm gonna go.
translation.zh: 我要走了

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: -Want me to wrap something up for you? -[Jodi] No, I'm okay. Thanks, Stig.
translation.zh: -要我为您打包点什么吗？-不 没事 谢谢你 斯蒂格

translation.en: Let me just grab one with a flash. And there's my handsome boy.
translation.zh: 让我开个闪光再拍一张我的帅气男孩

translation.en: You should go over there right now and talk it out.
translation.zh: 你应该现在就过去把事情说开

translation.en: But he is the one who said it was okay that I left.
translation.zh: 但是 是他说我可以离开的

translation.en: No, Jodi, he was being nice.
translation.zh: 不 乔蒂 他只是客气

translation.en: You are the ones who are always telling me to stand up for myself.
translation.zh: 你们总是告诉我要为自己说话

translation.en: Why should I be the first to crack?
translation.zh: 为什么我要先开口？

translation.en: There is no shame in cracking first.
translation.zh: 先开口没什么不好意思的

translation.en: -Actually, there is. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -其实会不好意思-对

translation.en: Were you guys eavesdropping?
translation.zh: 你们在偷听？

translation.en: If you crack first, Dunkleman is gonna hold all the cards in the relationship.
translation.zh: 如果你先开口 那他就占据主动权了

translation.en: Now, I know you kids think that love is about communication and give-and-take.
translation.zh: 我知道你们这些孩子觉得爱是沟通和妥协

translation.en: -Well, it's not. -No.
translation.zh: -但其实不然-不

translation.en: [mom] Relationships are about power.
translation.zh: 关系与权力相关

translation.en: -Who has it, and who doesn't. -That's right.
translation.zh: -有些人有 有些人没有-没错

translation.en: So I say, let Dunkleman sweat it out, and you focus on your show.
translation.zh: 听我的 把邓柯曼晾一会儿你专注在表演上

translation.en: Oh, which reminds me, we need 27 tickets for opening night.
translation.zh: 你提醒了我开幕表演我们要27张票

translation.en: -No, wait, 28. Dr. Seeger. -Oh. Right.
translation.zh: -不 等等 28张 还有西格医生-对

translation.en: You invited my pediatrician?
translation.zh: 你们邀请了我的儿科医生？

translation.en: Eh-- Look, I text Dunkleman, and I invited your pediatrician.
translation.zh: 听着 我是给邓柯曼发过信息我是邀请了你的儿科医生

translation.en: Please, let me live.
translation.zh: 但这是我的事

translation.en: Dr. Seeger probably saw me on the Tok.
translation.zh: 西格医生可能在短视频里看过我

translation.en: -[dad] Huh? -[mom] The Tickety Tok.
translation.zh: -抖了个音-噢

translation.en: I was doin' all of that. I was plugging your show, though.
translation.zh: 我就这么来着但是我有推广你的表演

translation.en: -You're on TikTok? -You don't follow me?
translation.zh: -你用了抖音？-你没关注我吗？

translation.en: Jodi, focus!
translation.zh: 乔蒂 别跑题！

translation.en: What's it gonna be?
translation.zh: 你要怎么做？

translation.en: Don't worry, they're gonna sell.
translation.zh: 别担心 都会卖掉的

translation.en: -I'm not worried. -I mean, it's only been a week.
translation.zh: -我不担心-我是说才一周

translation.en: Which is why I'm not worried.
translation.zh: 所以我不担心

translation.en: -And you shouldn't be either. -I just-- I can't help it. I'm a worrier.
translation.zh: -你也别紧张-我忍不住 这操心的命

translation.en: Yes, we've met.
translation.zh: 对 我懂你

translation.en: Lookin' beautiful as ever, Kim.
translation.zh: 你还是一如既往的美啊 基姆

translation.en: You're too kind, Conrad. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你太好了 康拉德

translation.en: Who was that?
translation.zh: 那是谁？

translation.en: My costar.
translation.zh: 我的对手戏演员

translation.en: Conrad?
translation.zh: 康拉德？

translation.en: No. Tommy. Conrad is his character name.
translation.zh: 不 汤米 康拉德是他的角色名字

translation.en: Well, Tommy thinks you're beautiful.
translation.zh: 好吧 汤米觉得你很漂亮

translation.en: No. That was just his character saying that to my character, Kim.
translation.zh: 不是 那是他的角色对我的角色基姆说的台词

translation.en: Well, this is Fareeda telling Jodi that Tommy thinks you're beautiful.
translation.zh: 好吧 现在是法丽达在告诉乔蒂汤米觉得你很漂亮

translation.en: Explain to me again why you can't crack first?
translation.zh: 你倒是解释一下为什么你不能先开口？

translation.en: Because I've been chasing her my entire life.
translation.zh: 因为一直都是我在追她

translation.en: If I just hold my ground, I can win this fight.
translation.zh: 如果我挺住了 就能赢下这场战斗

translation.en: -Nobody wins in this kind of fight. -This is America. There's always a winner.
translation.zh: 这种战斗没有赢家 -这里是美国 总有人是赢家-和输家

translation.en: [Stig] Pfft. And a loser.
translation.zh: -这里是美国 总有人是赢家-和输家

translation.en: There's my guy!
translation.zh: 我的伙计在这里！

translation.en: So, I know things got a little heated the other day,
translation.zh: 我知道那天我们有点不愉快

translation.en: and we said some things we didn't mean,
translation.zh: 大家都有点言不由衷

translation.en: and I think we should just forget it even happened.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们应该忘掉发生过什么

translation.en: And to sweeten the deal, I promise to lay off Jodi the Green Giant.
translation.zh: 为了让你好受一些我保证会让绿巨人乔蒂下台

translation.en: Do you know why I joined the crew?
translation.zh: 你知道我为什么会去幕后吗？

translation.en: It's because I saw how upset you were when you didn't get the lead.
translation.zh: 因为我知道你没拿到主演有多么的不安

translation.en: And I knew that having a friend by your side during rehearsals
translation.zh: 我知道在排练的时候有个朋友在身边

translation.en: would help you through it.
translation.zh: 会帮你度过那一切

translation.en: Name one time you've been there for someone who needed you.
translation.zh: 说一次当别人需要你的时候你在身旁的例子

translation.en: What, you want, like, specific dates?
translation.zh: 什么 你说某个具体的约会？

translation.en: If we're gonna be friends, I need to know you've changed,
translation.zh: 如果我们重新和好我得知道你已经改变了

translation.en: something you've made clear you don't wanna do.
translation.zh: 你说过你不想改变

translation.en: But I believe that you have a good heart,
translation.zh: 但是我相信你是个好人

translation.en: so I hope you'll reconsider.
translation.zh: 所以我希望再考虑一下

translation.en: Wait. You're making me eat lunch alone?
translation.zh: 等等 你是要让我一个人吃午餐？

translation.en: On some level, we all eat lunch alone.
translation.zh: 某种程度上来说我们都是在独自吃午餐

translation.en: -Oh, this is going to be so uncomfortable. -Why?
translation.zh: -这会超级难受-为什么？

translation.en: 'Cause I don't do well with open tension.
translation.zh: 因为我处理不好公开的剑拔弩张

translation.en: -Can you just be cool, please? -All right.
translation.zh: 你能稍微冷静点吗？ -对不起 酷男先生来报到了-斯蒂格

translation.en: -Mr. Cool Guy reporting for duty. -Oh, Stig.
translation.zh: -对不起 酷男先生来报到了-斯蒂格

translation.en: -Okay, come on. Somebody crack! -[hits table]
translation.zh: 好了 拜托 谁先开个口吧

translation.en: Dude, I had it.
translation.zh: 老兄 我可以的

translation.en: I have nothing to say to him.
translation.zh: 我跟他没什么可说的

translation.en: -You've got nothing to say to me? -No.
translation.zh: -你没什么要对我说？-没有

translation.en: Not even, say, an apology? For bailing on our anniversary dinner?
translation.zh: 就连道歉都没有？放了我们纪念日晚餐的鸽子？

translation.en: You said I could.
translation.zh: 你说过我可以

translation.en: You know, maybe instead of attacking each other,
translation.zh: 也许你们不应该攻击对方

translation.en: you could try to articulate what it is you want.
translation.zh: 而是试着阐述一下你们需要对方怎么样

translation.en: -Fareeda, excellent point. -Mmm. Let's unpack our wants.
translation.zh: 法丽达 说得好 让我们把需求说开

translation.en: Okay, fine. What I want is a girlfriend with a better work-life balance.
translation.zh: 好 我需要的是一个能更好平衡工作和生活的女友

translation.en: I don't know what you want.
translation.zh: 我不知道你需要我怎么做

translation.en: A girlfriend with a better work-life balance. I said!
translation.zh: 一个能更好平衡工作和生活的女友

translation.en: So if two people just aren't getting what they want out of a relationship,
translation.zh: 假如一段关系中两个人没能得到他们期待的东西

translation.en: what are they supposed to do?
translation.zh: 那该怎么办？

translation.en: Typically, they break up.
translation.zh: 一般说来 他们会分手

translation.en: Stig.
translation.zh: 斯蒂格

translation.en: I-- I mean, not they should break up. I just-- Oh my--
translation.zh: 我不是说他们应该分手我只是 我的天…

translation.en: -I don't know, man. Clearly, she wants to. -Now he's projecting.
translation.zh: 我不知道 很明显 她想 现在是他提出来了

translation.en: I just think that you wanna break up, and you don't have the guts to say it.
translation.zh: 我只是觉得你想要分手但你没有勇气说出来

translation.en: -You don't think I have the guts? -I don't think you have!
translation.zh: -你觉得我没有勇气？-我觉得你不敢！

translation.en: -I have the guts. -Really? Then say it!
translation.zh: -我敢-真的吗？那你说出来！

translation.en: You say it, if you have the guts to say it.
translation.zh: 你有勇气 你说啊

translation.en: Fine. I want to break up!
translation.zh: 好啊 我要分手！

translation.en: -Great. -[Dunk] Great!
translation.zh: -好-好！

translation.en: Why did I do that?
translation.zh: 为什么我要这么做？

translation.en: -[sighs] -I love citrus.
translation.zh: 我喜欢橘子

translation.en: [Fareeda] Stig.
translation.zh: 斯蒂格

translation.en: You would make a horrible therapist.
translation.zh: 你真是个糟糕的治疗师

translation.en: Yeah, I was pretty bad.
translation.zh: 对 我真的很糟糕

translation.en: My dad's outside. He needs to see me.
translation.zh: 我爸爸在外面 他要见我

translation.en: Is everything okay?
translation.zh: 一切还好吗？

translation.en: [Dunk] Yeah, he's right here.
translation.zh: 对 他在那里

translation.en: -Is everything okay? What's wrong? -Hold on. -I don't know. -Why are you here?
translation.zh: -一切还好吗？你为什么来这里？-不知道

translation.en: -Surprise! -[Stig] Oh my--
translation.zh: 惊喜！ 天啊！

translation.en: -What? -[girl laughing] Aaaah!
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: [Stig, in Swedish] What are you doing here? Visiting you,
translation.zh: -你在这里做什么？-来看你啊

translation.en: dummy!
translation.zh: 笨蛋！

translation.en: Who is this person?
translation.zh: 这个人是谁？

translation.en: -Stig's sister. -His sister?
translation.zh: -斯蒂格的姐姐-他的姐姐？

translation.en: Oh no. You rented more Swedes?
translation.zh: 不会吧 你又租房子给瑞典人了？

translation.en: We thought he'd appreciate having some family around,
translation.zh: 我们觉得有家人在身旁他会开心些

translation.en: since you've been ignoring him for three months.
translation.zh: 你已经忽视了他三个月

translation.en: I didn't know he had a sister.
translation.zh: 我不知道他有个姐姐

translation.en: That's because you don't talk to him.
translation.zh: 那是因为你没和他说过话

translation.en: Everyone, this is Stella.
translation.zh: 各位 这是斯黛拉

translation.en: Stella, this is Fareeda, and Jodi,
translation.zh: 斯黛拉 这是法丽达 还有乔蒂

translation.en: and that is Dunkers.
translation.zh: 这是邓柯儿

translation.en: Dunkers?
translation.zh: 邓柯儿？

translation.en: Hey. Hi.
translation.zh: 嘿 嗨

translation.en: Oh, you're even more adorable than your pictures.
translation.zh: 你比照片还要可爱

translation.en: -I am? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我吗？-对

translation.en: He is?
translation.zh: 他吗？

translation.en: And I can't believe I'm meeting the girl who broke my little brother's heart.
translation.zh: 我不敢相信自己终于见到了这个伤透了我弟弟心的女孩

translation.en: -Well-- -He called me that night in tears.
translation.zh: 你知道吗 他晚上哭着打电话给我

translation.en: -It was allergies. -"Who's going to love me?"
translation.zh: -是过敏-“谁还会爱我？”

translation.en: I was a mess.
translation.zh: 我当时很糟糕

translation.en: Oh, I can't wait for you to show me the city! Aah!
translation.zh: 我等不急去参观这个城市了！

translation.en: I've got time now. Who's gonna come?
translation.zh: 我现在有时间 谁一起去？

translation.en: [chuckles] I've got PE.
translation.zh: 我要上体育课

translation.en: -Calculus. -Oof.
translation.zh: 微积分

translation.en: -What about you, Dunkers? -Uh… Hm? Me?
translation.zh: -你呢 邓柯儿？-我？

translation.en: Dunkers is in.
translation.zh: 邓柯儿参加

translation.en: -[Stig] Yes! -[Dunk] Yeah!
translation.zh: 好！

translation.en: -Slam dunk! Whoo! -[Stella] Let's do this.
translation.zh: -邓柯儿来了！-来一下

translation.en: -Yes! [chuckles] -Come on.
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: [dad] Seat belts, gang. Seat belts.
translation.zh: 安全带 各位 安全带

translation.en: All right, Dad. Come on, back off.
translation.zh: 好了 爸爸 拜托 别吵了

translation.en: How was school today, bud? Who'd you play with?
translation.zh: 今天在学校怎么样 小伙子？你和谁玩了？

translation.en: [voice] Looks like there's a new tall girl in town.
translation.zh: 看来镇上有新的高个女孩了

translation.en: And she just drove off with your boyfriend… boyfriend…
translation.zh: 他刚刚和你男朋友开车离开了

translation.en: Sorry, ex-boyfriend. Perfect timing.
translation.zh: 对不起 前男友 完美时机

translation.en: -[Fareeda] Jodi? -Yeah?
translation.zh: -乔蒂？-嗯？

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: Dunk and I just… just broke up.
translation.zh: 邓柯儿和我刚刚分手了

translation.en: Aw, Jodi.
translation.zh: 啊 乔蒂

translation.en: So, how's Ingvar?
translation.zh: 那个 英瓦怎么样？

translation.en: -[retches] -Amazing.
translation.zh: -超级好-嗯

translation.en: -[Stig] Ew. -He says hi.
translation.zh: -超级好-嗯 他向你问好

translation.en: Wait, are you guys talking about Ingvar Kruger?
translation.zh: 你们说的是英瓦·克鲁格？

translation.en: You know Ingvar?
translation.zh: 你认识英瓦？

translation.en: Stig said he's the best-looking, coolest guy in your entire country.
translation.zh: 斯蒂格说他是你们全国最帅最酷的家伙

translation.en: -Are you guys dating? -Yes, and he completes my soul.
translation.zh: -你们是在约会吗？-对 他让我的灵魂都变得完整了

translation.en: Well, cherish each other.
translation.zh: 珍惜彼此

translation.en: Because at any moment, it could just all be over.
translation.zh: 因为随时可能玩完

translation.en: He and Jodi broke up.
translation.zh: 他刚和乔蒂分手了

translation.en: -That can't be! -[Dunk groans] You two are destined to be together.
translation.zh: 不可能吧！你们两个是天作之合

translation.en: -Destined to be together? -That's what Stig told me.
translation.zh: -天作之合？-是斯蒂格告诉我的

translation.en: What? When?
translation.zh: 什么？什么时候？

translation.en: The night he called to say he blew it with Jodi.
translation.zh: 他把乔蒂搞砸的那晚

translation.en: He said that what made the whole thing even worse
translation.zh: 他说更糟糕的是

translation.en: was he blew his chance to be friends with you.
translation.zh: 他失去了和你做朋友的时间

translation.en: -He doesn't have many of those back home. -You never said anything.
translation.zh: -他在家的时候没什么朋友-你从没说过

translation.en: You never asked.
translation.zh: 你从没问过

translation.en: I guess you're kind of right.
translation.zh: 我猜你说得对

translation.en: I never asked about your friends or your family or anything about you.
translation.zh: 我从来没有问过你的朋友你的家人或者你的其他事情

translation.en: I think I kind of blew my chance of being friends with you too.
translation.zh: 我觉得是我搞砸了和你做朋友的机会

translation.en: You did, you jerk.
translation.zh: 没错 你这个混蛋

translation.en: -Course not, Dunkers! I love you! [laughs] -[Dunk] All right.
translation.zh: -当然没有了 邓柯儿！我爱你！-好吧

translation.en: What do you think you're doing?
translation.zh: 你觉得自己在做什么？

translation.en: Just working through some Jodi feelings I've kept locked inside.
translation.zh: 就是把内心对乔蒂的感情表现出来

translation.en: What Jodi feelings?
translation.zh: 乔蒂的感觉？

translation.en: Love and loss, bro.
translation.zh: 爱与失落 老兄

translation.en: You didn't lose her, though. I did.
translation.zh: 你又没有失去她 是我失去了她

translation.en: I lost her a little bit.
translation.zh: 我有点失去了她

translation.en: No, I'm saying you can't lose someone a little bit. You lose them or you don't.
translation.zh: 你不能有点失去某个人要么就是失去 要么就是没失去

translation.en: Who'd have thought the love of our lives would be the same person?
translation.zh: 谁能想到我们生命中的爱人竟然是同一个人？

translation.en: -But you-- -This is crazy.
translation.zh: -但是你…-太疯狂了

translation.en: You made out with her in an escape room for, like, six seconds. That's not love.
translation.zh: 你只是在密室逃脱里跟她亲热了六秒那不是爱

translation.en: Then why is my heart still trapped in that escape room?
translation.zh: 那为什么我的心还留在密室里？

translation.en: I'm not your therapist.
translation.zh: 我不是你的治疗师

translation.en: Listen, now that you and Jodi are broken up,
translation.zh: 听着 既然你已经和乔蒂分手了

translation.en: think you could put in a good word for me?
translation.zh: 你能不能替我说说好话？

translation.en: -You missed a spot. -Hey, no.
translation.zh: -你漏了个点-嘿 别

translation.en: -Too late. -No.
translation.zh: -太迟了-别

translation.en: [voice] You definitely failed that calculus test.
translation.zh: 你绝对搞砸了微积分考试

translation.en: Maybe college isn't in the cards for you either.
translation.zh: 也许大学都没得上了

translation.en: -Jodi! -Mikey…
translation.zh: -乔蒂！-迈奇

translation.en: [voice] It's getting real. There's no turning back… turning back…
translation.zh: 事情成真了 现在回不了头了

translation.en: -You're in too deep now… too deep now… -[heartbeat]
translation.zh: 你现在已经深陷其中

translation.en: If you're this nervous looking at a poster,
translation.zh: 如果你连看海报都紧张

translation.en: what are you gonna do on stage?
translation.zh: 还怎么登上舞台？

translation.en: -Getting psyched for opening night? -Yeah, so psyched.
translation.zh: -很期待开幕的那晚吧？-对 很期待

translation.en: [voice] But look at Kimmy. So poised, so confident.
translation.zh: （周五3月29日 晚上7点） 但是 看看基姆啊如此镇定 如此自信

translation.en: For God's sake, the name of the role is Kim!
translation.zh: 天啊 简直就是基姆本人！

translation.en: Just quit and let her have it.
translation.zh: 退出让她演吧

translation.en: Jodi, breathe.
translation.zh: 乔蒂 呼吸

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: You're holding your breath.
translation.zh: 你憋住气了

translation.en: Oh. I was. [chuckles]
translation.zh: -是吧-对

translation.en: Do you ever find it nerve-racking to watch your understudies rehearse?
translation.zh: 你看着替补排练时会觉得紧张吗？

translation.en: Not really. No.
translation.zh: 不太会 不会

translation.en: [chuckles] Of course not. Because you don't get nervous.
translation.zh: 当然不会 因为你不会紧张

translation.en: Now, why wouldn't you think I get nervous, huh?
translation.zh: 为什么你觉得我不会紧张？

translation.en: I mean, look at you.
translation.zh: 看看你啊

translation.en: Wow. Okay, so you've been judged your whole life based on your appearance,
translation.zh: 哇 你这一辈子一直因为样貌被人指指点点

translation.en: and now you're doing the same thing to me?
translation.zh: 现在却对我做同样的事情吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I did just do the same thing.
translation.zh: 对 我做的是一样的事情

translation.en: -It's okay. -Sorry.
translation.zh: -没关系-对不起

translation.en: One of the reasons why I can remember every word of your homecoming speech
translation.zh: 我能记住你返校节演讲每个字的原因

translation.en: is because of how much I related to it.
translation.zh: 是因为和我息息相关

translation.en: In what way?
translation.zh: 怎么说？

translation.en: I'll show you.
translation.zh: 我带你去看

translation.en: -So this is where it happened. -Where what happened?
translation.zh: -就是在这里发生的-在哪里发生了什么？

translation.en: That was impressive! [laughs]
translation.zh: 太厉害了

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: This is the place where I got my nickname
translation.zh: 我就是在这里得到了一个外号

translation.en: that lasted all the way throughout middle school.
translation.zh: 影响了我整个初中时期

translation.en: Tommy-potamus. Yeah.
translation.zh: 河墩子汤米

translation.en: You… You were overweight?
translation.zh: 你超重了？

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Way over.
translation.zh: 对 超重得很

translation.en: How far over?
translation.zh: 有多么严重？

translation.en: Far enough to where I'd be going down that slide, and kids would just yell,
translation.zh: 严重到我只要走到滑梯那里就会有孩子大叫

translation.en: "Tommy-potamus is on the slide!" -"Earthquake! Take cover!" -Oh!
translation.zh: “河墩子汤米来滑梯了！地震了！躲起来！”

translation.en: -Creative. -Isn't it? -Mm. Yeah. [giggles] -Yeah.
translation.zh: -有创意-是吧？没错

translation.en: I don't know, I just-- I started exercising and eating right
translation.zh: 我不知道了我开始运动 合理饮食

translation.en: and got the weight off eventually.
translation.zh: 我不知道了我开始运动 合理饮食 终于减掉了重量但是我内心还是一样的感觉

translation.en: But I still felt the same way inside.
translation.zh: 终于减掉了重量但是我内心还是一样的感觉

translation.en: For me, it's movie theaters.
translation.zh: 对我来说 伤心地是电影院

translation.en: I've had so much stuff thrown at my head because I'm blocking the screen.
translation.zh: 我脑海里会有很多想法因为我挡住了荧幕

translation.en: -[laughs] I see. -I can't totally relax in movie theaters.
translation.zh: -我懂-我在电影院里无法彻底放松

translation.en: I think I'm just sitting there waiting to get pelted by popcorn.
translation.zh: 我觉得自己坐在那里就是等着被爆米花丢

translation.en: Well, hey. If we ever do go to the movies,
translation.zh: 如果我们有机会去看电影

translation.en: I am more than happy to sit in the back row with you, so…
translation.zh: 我会很愿意坐在你后面 所以…

translation.en: Well, you will be miserable, so I will buy the popcorn.
translation.zh: 你会很惨的 我去给你买爆米花

translation.en: I could never be miserable hanging out with you.
translation.zh: 和你在一起我永远不会觉得惨

translation.en: [laughs] It's-- It's funny, um…
translation.zh: 很有意思

translation.en: I've… I've never thought of guys dealing with the same weight issues that girls do.
translation.zh: 我从来没有想过男孩会和女孩一样有体重问题

translation.en: Yeah, those experiences just get hardwired into our brains.
translation.zh: 对 那些经历固定在我们的脑海里

translation.en: Totally shapes who we are and how we think.
translation.zh: 彻底塑造了我们的性格和思考方式

translation.en: Do you think it's possible for us to…
translation.zh: 你觉得我们有可能…

translation.en: I don't know, rewire our brains
translation.zh: 我不知道 重新调整思路吗？

translation.en: so that we don't get those negative thoughts?
translation.zh: 抛开那些消极的想法？

translation.en: I don't know. Let's give it a shot.
translation.zh: 我不知道 试试看吧

translation.en: May I have this dance, Kim?
translation.zh: 我能和你跳支舞吗 基姆？

translation.en: What? You-- You want to rehearse here?
translation.zh: 什么？你想在这里排练？

translation.en: Look, Jodi, this place has been just one big, bad memory for me.
translation.zh: 听着 乔蒂 对我来说这里是很重大、很糟糕的回忆

translation.en: Maybe you can help me turn it into a good one.
translation.zh: 也许你可以帮我把它变成美好的回忆

translation.en: -[music plays] -All right. -Guess so. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -好吧-也许可以吧

translation.en: -Okay. -[both laugh]
translation.zh: -好-行吧

translation.en: [Fareeda] What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: I knew Conrad liked you.
translation.zh: 我知道康拉德喜欢你

translation.en: Okay, Tommy.
translation.zh: -好吧 是汤米-爱谁谁吧

translation.en: Whoever. I have so many questions.
translation.zh: -好吧 是汤米-爱谁谁吧 我有好多问题

translation.en: Question one. Do you want it to happen again?
translation.zh: 问题一你还希望再发生一次吗？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: Question two. Does that mean you want to get back together with Dunk?
translation.zh: 问题二这代表着你想要和邓柯儿复合吗？

translation.en: I don't know. I mean, maybe Dunk's the one I'm supposed to be with.
translation.zh: 我不知道也许邓柯儿才是那个对的人

translation.en: -[groans] Okay, why do I feel so guilty? -Because you and Dunk just broke up.
translation.zh: -好吧 为什么我觉得那么内疚？-因为你和邓柯儿才刚分手

translation.en: But make no mistake, you are free to kiss whoever you want.
translation.zh: 但是你没错你可以自由地去亲你想亲的人

translation.en: -I know. -But so is Dunk.
translation.zh: 我知道 但邓柯儿也是

translation.en: I know. I just… I would like to believe that if he did,
translation.zh: 我知道 我只是希望如果他那么做了

translation.en: he would have enough respect to tell me so I wouldn't hear it from somebody else.
translation.zh: 他能够尊重我并告诉我这样我就不用从别人那里听说了

translation.en: -[Fareeda] Then you know what to do. -Yeah, I do.
translation.zh: -那你就知道该做什么了-对 我知道

translation.en: -Boom. -Oh, snap.
translation.zh: -嘣-天啊

translation.en: -Here it is. Ready? Five, six. -♪ But it's our song, so here we go ♪
translation.zh: -开始了 好了？五、六-这是我们的歌 这就开始了

translation.en: ♪ I don't care who you are… ♪
translation.zh: 我不在乎你是怎样的人

translation.en: -[laughs] ♪ Where you're from ♪
translation.zh: 你从哪里来

translation.en: ♪ What you did ♪
translation.zh: 你做过什么

translation.en: ♪ As long as you love me ♪
translation.zh: 只要你爱我就好

translation.en: We're never gonna break up.
translation.zh: 我们永远不会分手

translation.en: [Jodi] Never.
translation.zh: 永远不会

translation.en: -[Dunk] We're perfect. -[Jodi] Mwah!
translation.zh: 我们很完美

translation.en: Whatcha doin'?
translation.zh: 你在做什么？

translation.en: Hey! Don't you ever knock?
translation.zh: 嘿！你不会敲门吗？

translation.en: You've been in here for over an hour. I was worried.
translation.zh: 你已经在这里呆了一个小时了我很担心

translation.en: -[Dunk] I'm fine. -You're not fine.
translation.zh: 我没事 你不是没事

translation.en: You're watching videos of you and Jodi again?
translation.zh: 你又在看你和乔蒂的视频吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I can hear through the door.
translation.zh: 对 隔着门我能听到

translation.en: I'm deleting them, okay?
translation.zh: 我在删除它们 好吗？

translation.en: [Stig] How many have you deleted so far?
translation.zh: 你已经删除多少了？

translation.en: None. But I was about to before you barged in and interrupted me.
translation.zh: 还没有 但是在你闯进来打扰我之前我正准备这么做

translation.en: -Okay. Stella, come quick! -Don't--
translation.zh: 好了 斯黛拉 快点来！

translation.en: -She won't want to miss this. -[Dunk] Don't bring her into this.
translation.zh: -她不想错过这一幕-别把她牵扯进来

translation.en: What's up?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: Dunkleman was just about to delete all the videos of him and Jodi.
translation.zh: 他准备删除他和乔蒂的所有视频

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: -[Stella] Really? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -真的吗？-对

translation.en: -[Stella] Bold. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -有种-对

translation.en: But smart. Erase any memory of the relationship.
translation.zh: 但是放聪明点抹掉这段关系的所有记忆

translation.en: -Beignet? -Always.
translation.zh: 来点带馅煎饼？ 一如往常

translation.en: Oh, everyone knows when you eat these, you don't inhale.
translation.zh: 大家都知道吃这些玩意的时候不能大喘气

translation.en: Look, I know you guys don't believe me. -[coughing] -[Dunk] But check this out.
translation.zh: 听着 我知道你们不信但是都给我看好了

translation.en: Eighty-seven videos checked, and…
translation.zh: 87个视频 然后…

translation.en: they're deleted. They're gone. What are you doing?
translation.zh: 已经删掉了你拿我手机要干什么？

translation.en: The videos aren't truly deleted until you click "Delete permanently."
translation.zh: 没点击“永久删除”前视频不会被删掉的

translation.en: Yeah. Good save.
translation.zh: 好吧 说得好

translation.en: We definitely want to make sure that these cherished memories
translation.zh: 我们要确认一下这些对你来说很珍贵的记忆

translation.en: that meant so much to you are gone forever,
translation.zh: 会永远的消失

translation.en: never to be seen or experienced again.
translation.zh: 你再也无法观看或体验了

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Like they never even happened, Dunk.
translation.zh: 仿佛一切都没有发生过

translation.en: Yeah. After I press this button, they didn't. One--
translation.zh: 我按下这个键 他们就没了 一…

translation.en: -If so, I should-- -[Stig] And a half.
translation.zh: -如果谁该这么做…-一点五

translation.en: -Two. -[Dunk] Let me--
translation.zh: -二-二点五

translation.en: -[Stig] Two and a half. -Three! Fine! Uh-- You win!
translation.zh: -三-好吧！你们赢了！

translation.en: I'm not okay!
translation.zh: 我不好！

translation.en: I'm lost without her.
translation.zh: 没有她的我迷失了！

translation.en: And I-- I want her back. Is that what you want to hear?
translation.zh: 我想让她回来你们是想听我这么说吗？

translation.en: No, but I know someone else who might.
translation.zh: 不 但是我知道有人想听

translation.en: The, uh, mangoes are really fresh today, so… [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你来了 今天的芒果很新鲜

translation.en: Oh, uh… peace offering?
translation.zh: 示好吗？

translation.en: Tradition.
translation.zh: 老传统了

translation.en: So if we're, um, keeping with the traditions,
translation.zh: 如果我们还遵循以前的传统

translation.en: uh, are we still performing "As Long as You Love Me"
translation.zh: 那我们还会继续在法丽达的生日派对上

translation.en: at Fareeda's birthday party?
translation.zh: 表演《只要你爱我就好》？

translation.en: It's gonna be the highlight of the night.
translation.zh: 这将成为当晚的亮点

translation.en: Cool.
translation.zh: 酷

translation.en: -[chuckles] -I just can't even believe it.
translation.zh: 我真是不敢相信

translation.en: They discounted your shirts by 20%?
translation.zh: 她们把你的衬衫打了八折？

translation.en: Which is embarrassing enough.
translation.zh: 真是够难堪了

translation.en: But to make it even worse, I took my parents to the store,
translation.zh: 但是更难堪的是我还带着父母去了

translation.en: thinking they'd be impressed.
translation.zh: -我以为他们会被惊艳-不会吧

translation.en: And they saw with their own eyes that their daughter,
translation.zh: 他们亲眼看到了自己的女儿

translation.en: who'd been talking up her big future as a designer,
translation.zh: 吹嘘未来会做设计师的女儿

translation.en: had been marked down.
translation.zh: 被打折了

translation.en: So, um, I-- I just want to say how sorry I am for leaving our dinner.
translation.zh: 我想告诉你晚餐没吃完我就走了 很抱歉

translation.en: No, I'm sorry for overreacting.
translation.zh: 不 我为小题大做而道歉

translation.en: [laughs] Yeah.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Are we cool?
translation.zh: 我们没事了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, we're-- we're cool.
translation.zh: 对 我们没事了

translation.en: I choked at my Bye Bye Birdie audition.
translation.zh: 我搞砸了《欢乐今宵》的试演

translation.en: That was one time.
translation.zh: 只是这一次

translation.en: It happens every time.
translation.zh: 每次都是

translation.en: -Honestly, I've never even been in a show. -What?
translation.zh: -老实说 我还从来没演过戏-什么？

translation.en: When I met Jodi, I acted like I had been in Cats,
translation.zh: 我遇到乔蒂的时候假装自己演过《猫》

translation.en: 'cause I wanted to impress her. -Duh. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 因为我想惊艳她 但是吧

translation.en: If I'm goofing around at the piano, yeah, I can hold a tune.
translation.zh: 如果让我在钢琴旁边我能好好唱出来

translation.en: But the second I have to do it in front of other people…
translation.zh: 但是只要走到人前…

translation.en: Zhoop! I freeze.
translation.zh: 我就定住了

translation.en: Did you really think telling Jodi you were in Cats would impress her?
translation.zh: 你觉得告诉她自己演过《猫》就能惊艳她？

translation.en: Or anyone?
translation.zh: 对谁都是？

translation.en: If you are not moved by singing cats,
translation.zh: 如果你不能被唱歌的猫打动

translation.en: you have no soul.
translation.zh: 你就没有灵魂

translation.en: Well, good thing I'm a cat person.
translation.zh: 好在我喜欢猫

translation.en: Oh. Well, I'm a dog person, so I guess this is never going to work.
translation.zh: 好吧 我喜欢狗我猜永远都演不成戏了

translation.en: You know, there's something I need to tell you.
translation.zh: 有件事我想告诉你

translation.en: Really? 'Cause… 'Cause, you know, actually, so do I. Yeah.
translation.zh: 真的吗？真的吗 我也是

translation.en: -Oh, go first. -No, no, no, please, go ahead.
translation.zh: -那你先-不 你先说吧

translation.en: -[laughs] -Great. Okay. Um… [laughs nervously] Okay, um…
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Whew. Okay, I'm just gonna-- I'm just gonna say it.
translation.zh: 那个 我要…我要说出来…

translation.en: I kissed someone.
translation.zh: 我亲了一个人

translation.en: And I wanted you to hear it from me, because I really care about you.
translation.zh: 我希望是我告诉你因为我真的在乎你

translation.en: That's something that's never gonna change.
translation.zh: 这一点永远不会改变

translation.en: I just… Dunkleman, wait. No, no, no, no, I… [sighs]
translation.zh: 我只是…邓柯曼 等等 不 我…

translation.en: -Come on, dude. Help me out. -This is crazy. Relax.
translation.zh: -拜托 老兄 帮我一把-太疯狂了 放松点

translation.en: Just hold the bag for me.
translation.zh: 你只管把袋子拿好

translation.en: I just want everything that reminds me of her gone.
translation.zh: 我要把一切能让我想到她的东西统统丢掉

translation.en: -Pictures, memories. Like this. -No.
translation.zh: -照片 记忆 比如这个-不

translation.en: Yeah. The Backstreet Boys.
translation.zh: 对 后街男孩

translation.en: It's gotta go. I can't do it!
translation.zh: 都得丢掉 我做不到！

translation.en: What else? Come on. Get--
translation.zh: 还有什么？拜托了

translation.en: -Our future dogs! -No!
translation.zh: -我们未来的狗！-不！

translation.en: -They were. They're gone now! -No! Penelope and Fifi!
translation.zh: -现在都要消失！-不！佩内洛普和菲菲！

translation.en: No Dalmatians for Dunkers. Cat. All the cute animals. Especially the giraffe!
translation.zh: 邓柯儿不要斑点狗 猫可爱的小动物 特别是长颈鹿！

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait. Why the giraffe?
translation.zh: 等等 为什么是长颈鹿？

translation.en: Because tall!
translation.zh: 因为高！

translation.en: -That's actually good sense. -Yes, I know.
translation.zh: -还真能说得通-对 我知道

translation.en: [Dunk] Please leave a message.
translation.zh: 请留言 我将回复你

translation.en: Come on, Dunk. Can't we talk this out?
translation.zh: 够了 我们能把话说开吗？

translation.en: [Dunk] Her favorite book. [laughs] Yeah, I read this for her.
translation.zh: 她最喜欢的书 对 我还给她读过

translation.en: Hey, just calling to place my smoothie order for tomorrow.
translation.zh: 嘿 我打电话是为了订明天的奶昔

translation.en: [Dunk] Never making a smoothie again. That can go.
translation.zh: 再也不做奶昔了 这个也可以丢掉

translation.en: Too soon? Yeah. Too soon.
translation.zh: 太快了？好吧

translation.en: Why are there so many photos? I didn't even look good in this one.
translation.zh: 为什么还有这么多照片？这张的我不好看

translation.en: I'm gonna keep this for myself.
translation.zh: 我才不会留下这张

translation.en: This isn't fair. We were broken up.
translation.zh: 这不公平 我们当时分手了

translation.en: The camera she got me for my 15th birthday.
translation.zh: 这个相机是她送我的15岁生日礼物

translation.en: This? This has gotta go. Catch.
translation.zh: 这也得丢 拿好

translation.en: Gone.
translation.zh: 丢了

translation.en: I think you'll regret throwing all this out.
translation.zh: 我觉得丢掉这些 你会后悔的

translation.en: I'm up to my ears in regret, so what's one more?
translation.zh: 我已经悔到耳朵根了 还能怎么样？

translation.en: -Hey! Oh! Oh no! -[weeping] -Oh no. What's happened? -[sniffles]
translation.zh: 嘿 不 发生什么了？

translation.en: Ingvar has been cheating on me with Ebba Oloffson!
translation.zh: 英瓦和艾巴·奥洛夫森在一起背叛了我

translation.en: What? How do you know?
translation.zh: 什么？你怎么知道？

translation.en: Gunborg Bjork saw them kissing last night at the Jokkmokk Festival!
translation.zh: 冈伯格·比约克昨晚在约克莫克节上看到他们接吻了！

translation.en: I just called Ingvar, and I said, "I'm done with you!"
translation.zh: 我刚打了电话告诉他玩完了！

translation.en: -Good! -And relationships. Forever!
translation.zh: -好！-还有我们的关系 永远！

translation.en: Yes! Yes! You know, when I was in the second grade,
translation.zh: 对 你知道吗 我二年级的时候

translation.en: I wrote Jodi a note that said, "Will you go out with me? Yes or no?"
translation.zh: 给乔蒂写了张纸条“你愿意和我出去吗？是或否？”

translation.en: And she wrote in "Maybe."
translation.zh: 她写了个“也许”

translation.en: Our relationship was doomed from the start.
translation.zh: 我们的关系从一开始就注定要玩完

translation.en: -We don't need them. -No, we don't.
translation.zh: -我们不需要他们-不 我们不需要

translation.en: -Delete permanently. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -永久删除-对

translation.en: -Delete permanently. -Yeah!
translation.zh: -永久删除-对

translation.en: -Delete permanently! -Nice!
translation.zh: -永久删除！-干得好！

translation.en: I just had a great idea, Stella.
translation.zh: 我刚有个好主意

translation.en: -You and I should form an alliance. -An alliance?
translation.zh: -你和我组成一个联盟-联盟？

translation.en: Let's say they want to get back together with us.
translation.zh: 如果他们想和我们复合

translation.en: We can remind each other of this exact moment,
translation.zh: 我们可以提醒彼此就是此时此刻

translation.en: and prevent each other from ever feeling this kind of pain again!
translation.zh: 不让彼此再次痛心！

translation.en: -I'm in! -Great!
translation.zh: -我同意！-太好了！

translation.en: [gasps] What about you?
translation.zh: 你呢？

translation.en: I am not going to be a part of your stupid alliance.
translation.zh: 我才不要加入你们的愚蠢联盟

translation.en: Look, I've spent my entire life just waiting around for her.
translation.zh: 听着 我这一生都在等着她

translation.en: I have the bag of stuff to prove it.
translation.zh: 我有一大袋可以用来证明的东西

translation.en: Look at all this stuff. I've got… pictures in here. I've got mementos.
translation.zh: 看看这些东西这里还有照片、纪念品

translation.en: The camera she bought me when I was 15.
translation.zh: 这台相机是15岁时她送给我的

translation.en: You know what? Maybe Jodi wasn't supposed to be my destiny.
translation.zh: 你们知道吗？也许乔蒂不是我的天命之选

translation.en: Maybe this was the path I was supposed to go down. Photography.
translation.zh: 也许这才是我该选择的路 摄影

translation.en: Check it out. Who wants to be my first subject? Let's shoot.
translation.zh: 看看 谁想成为我的首个拍照对象？我们去拍照

translation.en: Forming the alliance is only phase one. All right? Phase two…
translation.zh: 阶段一是组成联盟 阶段二是我们要告诉前任们我们不需要他们

translation.en: Phase two is where we show our exes that we don't need them.
translation.zh: 阶段二是我们要告诉前任们我们不需要他们

translation.en: -That we're living our best lives. -We don't need relationships to be happy.
translation.zh: -我们过得很好-我们不谈恋爱也很快乐

translation.en: Thank you, yes. That we're not…
translation.zh: 谢谢你 我们才不会

translation.en: dying inside.
translation.zh: 伤心死呢

translation.en: I don't miss Ingvar at all.
translation.zh: 我根本不想念英瓦

translation.en: Oh, right, yeah. Okay. How are you doing that? Got this leg up here.
translation.zh: 对 你怎么做的？把这条腿放高点

translation.en: Okay. Oh, this is a little tougher than I…
translation.zh: 好 酷 有点难…

translation.en: Taking the picture. Here we go.
translation.zh: 拍照 这就来了

translation.en: You hate yoga. You have a weak core.
translation.zh: 你恨瑜伽 你的核心很弱

translation.en: Well, those things are just dangerous. [scoffs]
translation.zh: 好吧 这些东西真的很危险

translation.en: Oh! The puppies! [gasps]
translation.zh: 小狗！

translation.en: Oh my God, they're so… No!
translation.zh: 天啊 他们好…不！

translation.en: Balloon animals? Are you five now?
translation.zh: 气球动物？你们是五岁吗？

translation.en: Come on. It's not even Halloween.
translation.zh: 天啊 现在根本不是万圣节

translation.en: Why is she braiding his hair?
translation.zh: 她为什么要给他编头发？

translation.en: Okay, back to the puppies. I'm just going to crop them out.
translation.zh: 好了 回头看小狗我要把它们裁下来

translation.en: They're cute.
translation.zh: 他们很可爱

translation.en: -Hey, Harper, I really need to-- -Ah-buh-buh-buh-buh…
translation.zh: （《如何下象棋》） 嘿 哈珀 我真的需要…

translation.en: Chess teaches focus, creative thinking, and how to be quick on your feet.
translation.zh: 象棋能教人集中注意力创造性思考 以及如何快速行动

translation.en: All of which are going to sharpen my interview skills.
translation.zh: 所有这些都将提升我的采访能力

translation.en: Checkmate! Hah! Wow, I did not see that coming.
translation.zh: 将军 哇 我没想到会这样

translation.en: [Jodi] Dunkleman broke up with me.
translation.zh: 邓柯曼和我分手了

translation.en: I kissed somebody else and told him. Now he's not responding to me.
translation.zh: 我吻了别人 然后告诉他了现在他不回复我了

translation.en: It looks like he's living his best life!
translation.zh: 看起来他正在享受生活！

translation.en: And he even threw a puppy party! I mean--
translation.zh: 他甚至还办了个小狗派对！

translation.en: Why is this the first I'm hearing about this?
translation.zh: 为什么我刚刚才听说？

translation.en: You're leaving soon,
translation.zh: 你很快就要走了

translation.en: so I'm trying to wean myself off asking for advice when I have a problem.
translation.zh: 我想试着在遇到问题的时候不去询问建议

translation.en: I'm still here. Wean on me.
translation.zh: 我还在这里呢 问我啊

translation.en: Okay, what do I do?
translation.zh: 好吧 我该怎么办？
