translation.en: When Diego and I broke up, and I kissed Alexander--
translation.zh: 蒂亚戈和我分手的时候我吻了亚历山大…

translation.en: Harper, this is not about you.
translation.zh: 哈珀 这不是在说你

translation.en: Right, I always forget that.
translation.zh: 好吧 我总是忘了这一点

translation.en: Okay. If he's not returning texts or calls,
translation.zh: 如果他不回信息 不回电话

translation.en: you need to knock on his door and force him to talk things out.
translation.zh: 你就需要去敲门 逼他把事情说清楚

translation.en: What do I say?
translation.zh: 我要怎么说？

translation.en: You're an actress now. Let's improv.
translation.zh: 你现在是个女演员 我们即兴一下

translation.en: It'll be good practice for both of us. I'll be Dunkleman.
translation.zh: 对我们来说都是不错的练习 我演他

translation.en: Okay? And you be you.
translation.zh: 你演自己

translation.en: -Ready? -Okay… Okay.
translation.zh: -好了吗？-好了

translation.en: And action.
translation.zh: 那就…开拍

translation.en: Okay, uh, Dunkleman, look, I know that you're probably really, really upset with me--
translation.zh: 好吧 听着我知道你很生我的气…

translation.en: Of course I'm upset.
translation.zh: 我当然生气

translation.en: You kissed someone else mere moments after we broke up.
translation.zh: 你亲别人的时候 我们才刚刚分手

translation.en: Did the last three months mean nothing to you?
translation.zh: 所以过去的三个月对你来说什么都不是吗？

translation.en: Was our entire relationship just some big joke?
translation.zh: 我们的关系就是一个大笑话吗？

translation.en: -What? -I make you smoothies every day, Jodi!
translation.zh: -什么？-我每天给你做奶昔 乔蒂！

translation.en: -I know. No. -I stood on crates! You're a monster!
translation.zh: -我知道 不-我站在牛奶箱上！你这个怪物！

translation.en: I know. I know. I'm-- I'm the worst. I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 我知道 我太差劲了 对不起

translation.en: -I-- -Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa. I'm just preparing you for the worst-case scenario.
translation.zh: 哇 我只是让你准备面对最坏的情况

translation.en: Oh. Okay, so he's, like-- He's not going to say, like, any of that.
translation.zh: 好吧 所以他不会那么说的吧

translation.en: -No. [laughs] -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 不吧

translation.en: [sighs] Okay, okay. Good.
translation.zh: 好吧 还行

translation.en: -Well, he might. -[knocking]
translation.zh: 他也可能会

translation.en: [Jodi] Stella?
translation.zh: 斯黛拉

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Is Dunkleman home?
translation.zh: 邓柯曼在家吗？

translation.en: Hello, Jodi.
translation.zh: 你好 乔蒂

translation.en: [Jodi] Hi. Hi. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Wow, uh… [chuckles] I missed the memo, I guess.
translation.zh: 哇哦 我没想到

translation.en: Oh, the flannels?
translation.zh: 哦 法兰绒吗？

translation.en: We're trying to start a trend. Thanks for noticing.
translation.zh: 我们试着引领潮流 感谢你的关注

translation.en: Sorry, but I don't need this anymore.
translation.zh: 对不起 但是这个我不需要了

translation.en: It was a gift.
translation.zh: 这是个礼物

translation.en: It just doesn't feel right to keep it.
translation.zh: 只是觉得不该留下

translation.en: Good day.
translation.zh: 祝你开心

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: So, uh, about the other night.
translation.zh: 关于那天晚上

translation.en: -Yeah, look. -Yeah. I had the best time.
translation.zh: -听着 我过得很开心-好吧

translation.en: But you didn't say anything to me afterwards. Or since, really, so…
translation.zh: 但是之后你没和我说过话

translation.en: -Yeah, I… [sighs] -[sighs]
translation.zh: 对 我…

translation.en: My boyfriend and I had just broken up, and I mean just,
translation.zh: 我男朋友和我刚分手 我是说刚刚

translation.en: so I don't think I was expecting… that to happen so soon afterwards.
translation.zh: 所以我觉得不应该期待很快发生点什么

translation.en: We-- We don't have to rush into anything, okay?
translation.zh: 我们不必着急 好吗？

translation.en: I just-- I just wanna get to know you better.
translation.zh: 我只是想多了解你一些

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: So, you, uh, going to the burning ceremony Saturday night?
translation.zh: 你周六晚上去那个燃烧节吗？

translation.en: I heard something about that. [laughs] What is it exactly?
translation.zh: 我听说过 到底是什么？

translation.en: Well, it's before tech week starts.
translation.zh: 好吧 就是在设备到位那周之前

translation.en: Some of the cast, they get together at, uh, Crescent Park.
translation.zh: 一些演员会去新月公园

translation.en: Everyone brings a little something to throw in, you know.
translation.zh: 大家都会带点东西丢进去

translation.en: Anything to help clear their minds,
translation.zh: 让大家思路清晰的东西

translation.en: get rid of any negative energy before opening night.
translation.zh: 在开幕表演前摆脱消极的情绪

translation.en: That sounds--
translation.zh: 听起来…

translation.en: -Cheesy. I know, it is so cheesy. -[laughs] But it's gonna be great.
translation.zh: 太感性了 我知道是很感性但是会很好玩

translation.en: Yeah. I, um… I actually have a birthday party Saturday night.
translation.zh: 对 但是周六晚上我要去参加一个生日派对

translation.en: Maybe you can come to the bonfire first and hit up the party afterwards?
translation.zh: 也许你可以先来看篝火然后再去参加派对？

translation.en: I really don't know how much fun I'll be right now.
translation.zh: 我不知道现在会多么开心

translation.en: You're the lead. You should go.
translation.zh: 你是主角 应该过去的

translation.en: It'll be fun.
translation.zh: 会有意思的

translation.en: Okay, I'll go.
translation.zh: 好吧 我会去

translation.en: -I'll see you Saturday. -I will see you Saturday.
translation.zh: -那周六见-我们周六见

translation.en: -[Tommy] Actually-- -[Jodi] Yeah, I'm chemistry…
translation.zh: -事实上…-对 我要上…化学课

translation.en: -[Tommy] Art. -]Jodi] Ah.
translation.zh: 美术课

translation.en: So, my dad lives in Arizona, and he has never seen me in a show.
translation.zh: 我的爸爸住在亚利桑那他还从没看过我表演

translation.en: Every year, he says he'll try to make it out for one, and I believe him,
translation.zh: 每年他都说会试着过来看我相信他了

translation.en: but he never comes, just sends a postcard.
translation.zh: 但是他从来没来过只是寄一张明信片

translation.en: This is the year I stop believing.
translation.zh: 今年我已经不再相信了

translation.en: Very nice.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: All right, um… So, growing up,
translation.zh: 好吧 在成长中

translation.en: I had such messed-up body issues
translation.zh: 我有很严重的身材问题

translation.en: that I'd wear these oversized T-shirts so kids wouldn't make fun of me at school.
translation.zh: 我会穿着鞋超大号短袖这样那些孩子们就不会取笑我了

translation.en: And of course, this did not help the matter.
translation.zh: 当然 这并没有帮到我

translation.en: Hey, hey, look, they were cool back in the day, just not on me, and it's all right.
translation.zh: 嘿 这衣服当时很酷只是不适合我 不过也没关系

translation.en: Anyway, look, I don't know if anyone is truly 100% comfortable in their own skin,
translation.zh: 随便吧 我不知道有没有人百分之百喜欢自己的身体

translation.en: but, one day, I hope to be.
translation.zh: 但是希望有一天我可以

translation.en: Told you it was cheesy.
translation.zh: 跟你说过会很感性

translation.en: It was actually really cool.
translation.zh: 其实真的很酷

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: [chuckling] Okay, I'll go. Um…
translation.zh: 好了 到我了

translation.en: My boyfriend and I just broke up.
translation.zh: 我男朋友刚跟我分手了

translation.en: And, uh, he was my first boyfriend,
translation.zh: 他是我的第一个男朋友

translation.en: which I've heard is the hardest one to get over.
translation.zh: 我听说会很难忘记

translation.en: Anyways, uh, he…
translation.zh: 随便吧 他…

translation.en: He gave me these.
translation.zh: 他送了这个给我

translation.en: It's probably one of the sweetest things anyone has ever done for me.
translation.zh: 也许这是别人为我做过最美好的事情

translation.en: But as long as these exist,
translation.zh: 但是只要它们还在

translation.en: I don't think I'll be able to move on.
translation.zh: 我觉得就没法向前

translation.en: And I want to move on.
translation.zh: 我想要向前

translation.en: I need to move on.
translation.zh: 我需要向前

translation.en: So, um, this is the first step.
translation.zh: 所以这是第一步

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: -Wait, no, no, no, no. -Hey! -No! I don't want to move on. -That's not safe.
translation.zh: -等等 不 我不想向前-这样不安全

translation.en: -I think it's too late. -I got it!
translation.zh: -我觉得太迟了-我来吧！

translation.en: Jodi says she'll be here soon. She's finishing up a cast thing.
translation.zh: 她说很快就过来她在忙剧团的事情

translation.en: Of course she is.
translation.zh: 她当然是了

translation.en: So did you tell your parents the good news yet?
translation.zh: 所以… -你把好消息告诉父母了吗？-还没有

translation.en: [Fareeda] Not yet.
translation.zh: -你把好消息告诉父母了吗？-还没有

translation.en: Fareeda's shirts sold out!
translation.zh: 法丽达的衣服都卖完了！

translation.en: No way!
translation.zh: 不会吧！

translation.en: -[laughs] -Well, that's wonderful, dear!
translation.zh: 好吧 太好了 亲爱的！

translation.en: -You should be proud of yourself. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你应该很为你自己骄傲-对

translation.en: I am. Are you?
translation.zh: 我是啊 你们呢？

translation.en: -Of course we are. -Yes.
translation.zh: -我们当然了-好

translation.en: But you turned 17 today, and it's time to get serious about your future.
translation.zh: 但是你今天17岁了是时候认真考虑未来了

translation.en: And it's not that we don't think that you're talented, because we do.
translation.zh: 这并不是因为我们认为你没有天赋我们相信你

translation.en: But the odds of succeeding in the fashion industry are next to impossible, sweetheart.
translation.zh: 但是想在时尚领域成功几乎不可能

translation.en: -Medical school is a safer career path. -Exactly. Yes.

translation.en: So I tried to learn some tips in case it ever happened to Harper.

translation.en: you know, just in case it ever happens again? [chuckles]

translation.en: staring at these boxes.

translation.en: And I can't bring myself to tape them up.

translation.en: Because ever since I was eight years old, no matter what I did,

translation.en: you were there.

translation.en: -And now I won't have that anymore. -No.

translation.en: But what if I tank this job?

translation.en: Or what if I get fired?

translation.en: get that voice?

translation.en: Since always.

translation.zh: -惊喜-什么？

translation.en: [laughs] What about the,

translation.en: "If you don't learn to control it, it's gonna control you"?
translation.zh: “你如果不学着控制它就会控制你呢？”

translation.en: Yeah, I don't know how to control it. I just wanted to sound like I did.
translation.zh: 对 我不知道如何控制我只是想要听起来像是能做到

translation.en: You want people to take you seriously?

translation.zh: 那就别害怕在不知道的时候说出

translation.en: if you don't know.
translation.zh: “我不知道”

translation.en: How I'm gonna survive without you.

translation.en: Me neither.

translation.en: Pack, or… or leave us?

translation.en: One box at a time.

translation.en: -What? Fareeda? -Yeah.

translation.en: That's awesome, right?

translation.en: Except she says it can't go anywhere because of girl code.

translation.en: [Jodi] Thank you.

translation.en: -Yes! -[laughs]
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: -Great job tonight. -Thanks.

translation.en: [girl] Hi.

translation.en: You know, my school back in Sweden has a foreign exchange student program.

translation.en: You think I'm gonna move across the world

translation.en: to spend my senior year with you after one kiss?

translation.en: -Come on. Take a chance on me. -♪ I could love you with my eyes closed… ♪

translation.en: -You killed it, big little sister. -Thank you, little big sister.

translation.en: Okay, do not leave me in suspense.

translation.en: How did you control this?

translation.en: Oh, I didn't.

translation.en: Just for the first time, I was kind of able to…

translation.en: turn down the volume.

translation.en: But how?

translation.en: I was good tonight.

translation.en: If the voice inside my head refuses to tell me that,

translation.en: then… I don't know, I guess I'm just gonna have to tell myself.

translation.en: And just like that, the teacher has become the student.

translation.en: That is not how that saying goes.

translation.en: Agree to disagree.

translation.en: -[sighs] -[Dunk] Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Hey.

translation.en: That's so sweet. [chuckles] Okay. What is it?

translation.en: [Jodi] How did you…
translation.zh: 你怎么还…

translation.en: [laughs] How did you get this?

translation.en: Well, the day after we broke up,

translation.en: I was doing some Marie Kondo-ing around the house, and I just found it.

translation.en: I love it. -[chuckles] -I love it! Wow!

translation.en: But something's really off.

translation.en: -♪ Has always been a friend of mine… ♪ -So much better.

translation.en: ♪ Don't care what is written In your history ♪
